column3: rnam grangs bsdu ba bzhugs /// / +rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las rnam grangs bsdu ba / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269026#269031#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6924;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6925# 'dus ma byas gnas su gyur pa rtsol ba med pa thob par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi sku thob par 'gyur ba ste / /

column3: spyi sdom ni / / +dkar po'i phyogs dang nag po'i phyogs // / +rnam grangs dag ni yang dag bshad // / +don gyis blo rab rtogs bya'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269028#269049#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6924;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6926;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6927;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6928# 'dus ma byas gnas su gyur pa rtsol ba med pa thob par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi sku thob par 'gyur ba ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las / /

column3: spyi yi sdom ni bsdus pa yin // / +sdom ni / / +ston dang mchog nyid shes rab bzhi // /
de bzhin legs par gsungs pa dang / / +gleng gzhi yod dang sbyin pa dang / / +tshul khrims lam rab rgyas pa yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269050#269059#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6927;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6928;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6929# sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis drangs pa'i phyir rang gi ngang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad de / / +dper na rnal 'byor pa dag 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba bzhin no zhes bshad do // /

column3: de la ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o // / +rab tu ston pa ni de'i slob ma'i mchog rnams te gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269058#269070#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6928;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6929;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6930# dper na rnal 'byor pa dag 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba bzhin no zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gal te lhag ma med pa'i  mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la sgrib pa med de / /

column3: rjes su ston pa ni slob dpon dang  mkhan po dang  chos mthun pa ba rnams dang  skul bar byed pa rnams dang  dran par byed pa rnams so // / +de la ston pa ni ston par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269071#269079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6929;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6930;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6931;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6932;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6933# gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gal te lhag ma med pa'i  mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la sgrib pa med de / / +ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sgrib pa mi mnga' ba de kho na bzhin du / /
column5: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3131511#3131524#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5432;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5433;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5434;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5435;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5436# gal te de la sgrib pa med pa de / / +ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sgrib pa mi mnga' ba de kho na bzhin du dgra bcom pa la yang sgrib pa med pa yin na / /

column3: rab tu ston pa ni rab tu ston par byed pa'o // / +rjes su ston pa ni rjes su ston par byed pa'o // / +bya ba rjes  su gnang ba dang  bya ba ma yin pa 'gog pa dang  dus dus su gdams ngag dang  rjes su bstan pa la rab tu 'jug par byed pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269080#269097#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6931;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6932;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6933;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6934;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6935# dgra bcom pa la yang sgrib pa med pa yin na / / +ci'i phyir dgra bcom pa yang / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa mi byed ce na / /
column5: 0.011#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3131534#3131536#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5436# sngon smon lam  bsgoms pa med pa'i phyir dang  de lta bu'i rigs can yin pas de'i phyir dgra bcom pa ni ldang ba'i bsam pa med pa kho nar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas na de'i phyir mi byed do // /

column3: de dag nyid gsung ba dang  rab tu gsung pa dang  rjes su gsung ba yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: 'dren pa ni bya ba ma yin ba la brtson pa rnams  tshar gcod par byed pa'o // / +rnam par 'dren pa ni bya ba la brtson pa rnams yang dag par mgu bar byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269106#269116#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6935;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6936;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6937;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6938# sngon smon lam  bsgom pa med pa'i phyir dang  de lta bu'i rigs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa ni ldang ba'i bsam pa med pa kho na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas na de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa mi byed do // / +gang gi tshe spros pa med pa'i dbyings de gang gi grangs su yang 'gro    pa yin na ci ltar mngon du byed ce na / /

column3: rab tu 'dren pa ni de gnyi ga yang dag par skul bar byed pa'o // / +'dren par byed pa ni the tshom skyes shing byung ba yang dang yang du rnam par sel bar byed pa'o // /

column5: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3131659#3131662#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5462;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5463# 'di lta ste dper na 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa la snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang bar bya'o // / +ldang ngo snyam du de ltar sems pa med kyang sngon mngon par 'du byas pa'i dbang  gis langs nas yang sems dang bcas pa'i spyod pa la spyod par byed pa de bzhin du 'di yang tshul de bzhin du blta bar bya'o // /

column3: rnam  par 'dren par byed pa ni 'gyod pa rnams yang dang yang du rnam par sel bar byed pa'o // / +rab tu 'dren par byed pa ni nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yang dang yang du rnam par sel bar byed pa'o // /

column3: yang the tshom rnams gcod par byed pa dang  don dam  par ma phye ba rnams rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang  don rnam par phye ba rnams gsal bar byed pa dang  don dang tshig zab mo shes rab kyis yang dang yang du rtogs par byas te / /

column7: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2327926#2327926#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2059# rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas 'du byed kyi mtshan MA DE NYID LA KUN brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su ma grub pa'i slad du ngo bo nyid de kho nas ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid chos bdag ma  mchis pa de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang lags pa de ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bgyi lags te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa khong du chud pa nyid rnam par phye nas bstan pa'o // /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2328612#2328614#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2129# kho nas ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid chos bdag ma mchis pa de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang lags pa de ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bgyi lags te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa khong du chud pa rnam par phye ste bshad  pa'o // /
column9: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246877#246879#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4182# chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  byang  chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba man chad kyis longs spyod  rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /

column8: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2328612#2328614#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2129# kho nas ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid chos bdag ma mchis pa de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang lags pa de ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bgyi lags te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa khong du chud pa rnam par phye ste bshad  pa'o // /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222882#222882#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2327926#2327926#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2059# rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas 'du byed kyi mtshan ma de nyid la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su ma grub pa'i slad du ngo bo nyid de kho nas ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid chos bdag ma  mchis pa de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang lags pa de ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bgyi lags te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa khong du chud pa nyid rnam par phye nas bstan pa'o // /
column11: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122768#3122768#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4385# bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa gang lags pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gang lags pa dang  yongs    su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po gang lags pa de dag gi mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags / /

column3: bag yod pa ni dad pa thob pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa'i gags su gyur pa'i chos dag las sems kun du srung ba gang yin pa dang rgyun du dge ba'i chos sgom par brtson pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269401#269410#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6980;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6981;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6982# bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de  bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269410#269418#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6981;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6982# 'di yang rnam pa bdun du dbye ste / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag par longs spyad pa'i sku'i sems 'byung ba'i mtshan yid bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid  bstan pa dang  mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa la sogs pa rnam pa gsum gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang  theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par  grol ba'i lus kyi bye brag bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi mthus sems can gyi lus yongs su 'dzin par bstan pa dang  zhing yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa na dngos po gang dag rnyed dka' ba dang  gang dag yod pa'i mtshan    nyid bstan pa'o // /

column3: sbyor ba ni lung dang  kha ton dang  yongs su 'dri ba dang  'brel ba'i gtam rnam par nges pa la yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269419#269437#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6982# de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag par longs spyad pa'i sku'i sems 'byung ba'i mtshan yid bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid  bstan pa dang  mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa la sogs pa rnam pa gsum gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang  theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par  grol ba'i lus kyi bye brag bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi mthus sems can gyi lus yongs su 'dzin par bstan pa dang  zhing YONGS SU DAG PA DANG  yongs su ma dag pa na dngos po gang dag rnyed dka' ba dang  gang dag yod pa'i mtshan    nyid bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246798#246799#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4178# zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan dag gis chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku skye ba med par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbye brag  bstan pa dang  de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis zhes bya ba 'di man chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs skye ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  sprul pa'i sku la sems mnga' 'am mi mnga' ba bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan  nyid bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku     // /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2326687#2326687#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1935# rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul gyi gnas kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  gzugs kyi phung po'i ngo bo nyid dang bye brag bstan pa dang  gzugs kyi phung po'i skye ba dang  'gag pa dang  gtan du spangs pa dang  yongs su shes pa rnam par dbye ba'o // /

column3: sems pa ni ji skad bstan pa dang mnos pa'i chos dang don la yongs su rtogs pa'o // / +dran pa ni yongs su brtags pa'i don mi brjed pa dang  yun ring mo  zhig na byas pa dang bshad pa yang rjes su dran pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248444#248446#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4379;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4380# 'di ni dang po sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273327#273328#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7459;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7460# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / / +rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i mthus byin gyis brlabs nas lam gang dang bsgrub pa gang gis thams cad du  sems can rnams lus phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dag ci rigs par de dag la lam de dang bsgrub pa de yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273619#273620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7487;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7488# 'di ni dang po zhing yongs su dag pa dang ma dag pa dag na dngos po gang dkon pa dang mod pa cig car zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271072#271074#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7172;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7173;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7174# 'on te sems mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272366#272367#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7358;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7359;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7360# 'og nas lan du gsungs pa'i tshig dang  sbyar na dgongs pa rnam pa 'di gsum yod do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column10: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252138#252139#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4746;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4747# rnam pa  sna tshogs su bshad pa 'byung ba ni mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column11: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263912#263912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6309;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6310# phug ron shin tu yun ring po'i dus su sangs rgyas su 'grub par  'gyur ro zhes bstan pa la sogs pa'i bstan pa dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub pa yin pas khungs su brjod par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column12: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271465#271466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7226;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7228# 'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column13: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274697#274698#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7639# bcom ldan  'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272715#272715#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7390;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7391# theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus las ni dngos po 'di  dag mi 'byung lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column15: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#268169#268169#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6809# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub  sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /

column3: mu stegs can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir bla ma zhes bya'o // / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir bla na med pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269534#269547#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6991;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6992;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6993# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / / +rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba yin mod kyi / /
column5: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122599#3122601#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4365;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4366# 'jam  dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems dang  yid dang rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba ma yin mod kyi / /

column3: mu stegs can dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa zhes bya'o // / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269546#269562#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6993;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6994;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6995# 'on kyang de  bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rtsol ba mi mnga' bar sems kyi chos 'byung ste / /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2372588#2372588#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7363# rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid yid la byed pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397670#2397672#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10281# sangs rgyas kyi  sa'i bar du bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231024#231025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2178# rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na rnam pa bzhir rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column8: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220026#220026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_767# rigs kyi bu rkyen rnam pa bzhi'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston te // /
column9: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236532#236532#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2889# rigs kyi  bu gcig la gcig brten nas bsgom pa bskyed pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column10: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236753#236753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2919# rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa lnga'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column11: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342707#2342708#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3698;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3699# gnyis ni gnyi ga'i yul gyi dmigs pa'i dngos po yin te 'di lta ste dngos po'i mtha' dang dgos pa yongs su grub pa'o     // / +zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column12: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355498#2355499#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5208# 'dres pa chung du'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column13: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381382#2381383#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8431# 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems ni gnyi ga'i sgrib pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column14: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221204#221204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_897# ngas brtson 'grus thams    cad du 'gro ba yin par bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column15: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238793#238793#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3184# rigs kyi bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi  ngo bo nyid med pa 'dzin par byed do zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column16: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253447#253449#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4931# sems can du gdags    pa'i dngos po dang  de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po dang  de 'byung ba'i dngos po dang  de 'byung ba gnas pa'i dngos po dang  de'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i dngos po dang  de'i bye brag gi dngos po dang  ston par byed pa'i dngos po dang  bstan par bya ba'i dngos po dang  'khor gyi dngos po'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column17: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378999#2378999#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8145# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams  pa la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyis deng 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di ltar don zab mo 'dri ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i ched du'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de  bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column18: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271486#271486#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7231# sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column19: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248762#248762#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4410# sbyin gnas chen por grags pa'i khyim du zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column20: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381877#2381877#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8489# rigs kyi bu ji tsam du rmugs pa dang gnyid yod pa dag yang dag bar legs par rab tu bsal bar gyur ba de tsam gyis na zhi gnas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag ba thob pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de    bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column21: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273800#273800#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7511;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7512;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7513# byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang  sbyor ba mchog dang ldan pa rnams kyi spyod pa dang rnam par rgyu zhing 'du ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba'o zhes bya ba ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas     // / +yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column22: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345637#2345637#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4036# rigs kyi bu tha dad pa    yang ma yin tha dad pa ma yin pa yang ma yin zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa bstan to // /
column23: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396297#2396297#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10124# rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di la khyod kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zhus pa'i lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column24: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246111#246111#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4101# sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs  su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column25: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274713#274713#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7641;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7642# khyod kyis yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs  pa ston to // /

column3: rnam grangs gzhan yang 'jig rten  pa'i dge ba'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang thun mong ba'i phyir mchog go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269563#269572#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6994;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6995;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6996;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6997# dngos po 'di ni sprul pa lta bur rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dang  yid dang ; /

column3: nyan thos kyi dge ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang thun mong ba'i phyir gtso bo'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269570#269580#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6996;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6997;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6998# de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dang  yid dang ; / +rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rtsol ba mi mnga' bar bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa la rtsol ba mi mnga' bar yang sems kyi chos 'byung bar bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.016#TD4095E.TXT.r#70156#70157#TD4095E.TXT.r_1391;TD4095E.TXT.r_1392;TD4095E.TXT.r_1393# don gcig 'byed pas na sems so // / +go bas na yid  do ; / / +rnam par shes pas na rnam par shes pa'o // /
column6: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2786686#2786686#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11923# dman pa'i sems nyid dang  kun nas shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang  don gzung ba'i sems nyid dang  don legs par gzung ba'i sems nyid dang  gus pa'i sems nyid do // /
column7: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#777596#777596#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1773;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1774# 'dir yang sems bcas pa smos pa ni 'di sems gyengs pa med pas na sems ma gyengs pa ste / / +sems gyengs pa bkag pa'i phyir dang  mi gyeng ba mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#706460#706460#TD4091E.TXT.r_2229;TD4091E.TXT.r_2230# lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ni reg bya'o // / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ni chos thams cad  de ; /

column3: rang sangs rgyas kyi dge ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang thun mong ba'i phyir khyad par du 'phags pa'o // / +nyon mongs  pa'i sgrib rnam par dag pa'i phyir bla ma'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269579#269592#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6997;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6998;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7000;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7001# rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rtsol ba mi mnga' bar bstan pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa la rtsol ba mi mnga' bar yang sems kyi chos 'byung bar bstan pa'o // / +sems dang  yid dang  rnam par shes pa'i don de yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column5: 0.029#TD4044E.TXT.r#393644#393644#TD4044E.TXT.r_2190;TD4044E.TXT.r_2191# skyed pa ni 'phel ba thob par byed pa'o // / +ji ltar sems te zhes bya ba ni yid kyis kyang zhes  bya ba'i don to // /

column3: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o // / +rnam grangs gzhan yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir mchog go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269593#269603#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7000;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7001;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7002;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7003# zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems de yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +dang po ni bye brag gi ming du sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba yin te / /

column3: gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir gtso bo'o // / +gzugs med pa na  spyod pa'i dge ba phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir khyad par du 'phags pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269604#269615#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7002;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7003;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7004;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7005# kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni sems zhes bya'o // / +nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni yid ces bya'o // /

column3: khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir bla ma'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269616#269623#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7005;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7006# gnyis pa ni spyi'i ming du rnam par shes pa brgyad po thams cad kyang sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#525614#525614#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9935# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'di dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems las byung ba ni bco brgyad de / /

column3: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i dge ba phun  sum tshogs pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269624#269633#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7005;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7006;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7007;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7008# gnyis pa ni spyi'i ming du rnam par shes pa brgyad po thams cad kyang sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529338#529338#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10434# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /

column3: sems can rkang med rnams ni 'di lta ste sbrul la sogs pa'o // / +sems can rkang gnyis rnams ni 'di lta ste mi la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269634#269642#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7007;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7008;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7009# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo de dang de dag tu sems dang yid     // / +dang rnam par shes pa gsum po dag gi don tha dad pa gsungs te / /

column3: sems can rkang bzhi rnams ni 'di lta ste / / +glang po che la sogs pa'o // / +sems can rkang mang rnams ni 'di    lta ste srin gyi me la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269643#269655#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7009;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7010;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7011;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7012# bsags pa las byung bas na sems zhes bya'o // / +sems pas na yid ces bya'o // /

column3: sems can gzugs can rnams ni 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i khams nas bzung ste / / +bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag go // / +sems can gzugs can ma yin pa rnams ni 'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269656#269666#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7012;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7013;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7014# don rnam pa gsum po de dag rnam par shes pa brgyad po kun la khyab  pa yin yang gtso bo'i rjes su byas te / /

column3: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas bzung ste / / +'du shes med 'du  shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269665#269679#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7013;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7014;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7015;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7016# bstan nas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni sems zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.020#TD4019E.TXT.r#2414875#2414875#TD4019E.TXT.r_987# zhes 'byung bas go rims bzhin du kun gzhi dang  nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa tshogs  drug po rnams rang rang gi ngo bos stong pa nyid du rtogs shing / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522618#522618#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9512;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9513# chos rnams kyi sa bon bsags nas chos rnams 'byung ba byed pa'i  phyir ro // / +nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ces bya ste / /
column7: 0.029#TD4019E.TXT.r#2472449#2472449#TD4019E.TXT.r_8552;TD4019E.TXT.r_8553# de nyid gsal bar bstan pa ni yid dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa lhan cig tu kun gzhi la bdag dang bdag gir mngon  par chags pas ngar sems pa ste / /

column3: sems can 'du shes can rnams ni 'di lta ste / / +'du shes med pa'i sems can ma gtogs pa 'dod pa'i khams nas bzung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269678#269687#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7015;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7016# nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni yid ces bya ste / / +kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa la dmigs shing rtag par nges  par bdag la sogs par sems pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar dag go // / +'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams ni 'di lta ste // / +'du  shes med pa'i lha rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269686#269696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7017;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7018# kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa la dmigs shing rtag par nges  par bdag la sogs par sems pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sems can rnams ni 'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269697#269704#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7017;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7018;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7019# gzhan drug po dag ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste / / +rigs pa gyo ba bar chad dang bcas pa nyid rnam par rig pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba yin no // /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#461408#461408#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1561;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1562# snga ma bzhi'i steng du yang rigs ma nges pa bsnan na rigs rnam pa lngar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las / /

column3: 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams so // / +mdor bsdu na rnam pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su gyo ba dang  sku dang thugs kyi  sgo nas mchog nyid rnam pa gsum yongs su bstan pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269705#269712#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7018;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7019;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7020# rigs pa gyo ba bar chad dang bcas pa nyid rnam par rig pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba yin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa  las ji skad du / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269713#269725#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7019;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7020;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7021;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7022;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7023;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7024# gzhan yang 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa  las ji skad du / / +kun gzhi la ni sems zhes bya // / +sems pa'i bdag nyid yid ces bya // /

column3: shes rab rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni bye brag med par dge ba dang  don dang ldan pa'i shes rab gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269724#269733#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7022;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7023;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7024;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7025;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7026# yul gyi mtshan nyid rnam rig pa // / +de ni rnam par shes zhes bstan // /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2339415#2339416#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3330;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3331# sems can mos pa ji bzhin so sor go // / +zhes gsungs pa yin no // / +gzhan yang don tshad med pa'i mdo las / /

column3: shes rab rgyas pa dang  'phel ba dang  yangs pa zhes bya ba ni chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen por khyad  par du 'phags pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269731#269749#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7024;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7025;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7026;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7027;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7028# zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i mdo las / /

column3: shes rab rnam par byang ba ni sngon goms par byas pa'i shes rab dus gzhan du yongs su smin pa'o // / +shes rab 'byor pa ni nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa dang  spong ba'i shes rab gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269750#269757#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7028# ched 'ga' ni sems zhes bya ba'i ming gnas skabs thams cad rtogs par gsungs pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas skabs kyang rnam  par shes pa la sogs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: shes rab yongs su skong ba ni de nyid mthar thug par 'gro  ba'o ; / / +shes rab yongs su mi nyams pa ni de nyid yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269758#269767#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7028;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7029# ched 'ga' ni sems zhes bya ba'i ming gnas skabs thams cad rtogs par gsungs pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas skabs kyang rnam  par shes pa la sogs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: shin tu tshar phyin pa'o // / +shes rab myur ba nyid ni skyen par rab tu shes pa'o // / +shes rab mgyogs pa nyid ni shes rab yongs su mi gtugs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269768#269779#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7029;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7030;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7031# mdo 'di las ni zag pa dang bcas pa rnam par rtog pa'i sems dang yid dang rnam pa'i dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.025#TD4027E.TXT.r#559107#559107#TD4027E.TXT.r_1223;TD4027E.TXT.r_1224# shes rab gsum gyis yid byed pa'o // / +sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dbang du mdzad nas  theg pa chen por mdo la sogs pa ji ltar btags pa'i chos rnams thos pa dang  bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis rgyun du yid la byed pa ni yid la byed pa bsgrub pa'o // /

column3: shes rab rno ba nyid ni ji snyed pa dang ji lta ba bzhin du  rab tu shes pa'o // / +nges par 'byung ba'i shes rab nyid ni nges par 'byung par bya ba'i chos rnams dang  'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba yang rab tu shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269778#269793#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7030;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7031;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7032;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7033;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7034# de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba ma yin zhes gsungs kyi / / +zag pa med pa'i  sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa ni ma yin te / /

column3: nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab nyid ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rab tu shes pa'o // / +shes rab     // / +zab pa ni zab mo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos rab tu shes pa dang  don dang tshig zab mo yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269794#269803#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7033;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7034;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7035# sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i sems so zhes gsungs so // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos byang chub kyi tshogs bstan pa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269804#269814#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7035;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7036# sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba    ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnam par rtog pa can zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni de dag gdags pa la shes rab yin no // / +nyan thos  rnams kyi ni gdags pa la shes rab chen po yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269815#269822#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7036# de la 'on KYANG DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA RNAMS ni rtsol ba mi mnga' bar sems kyi chos 'byung ste zhes bya ba 'dis NI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA LA rnam par rtog pa'i yid la byed par mi mnga' mod kyi / /

column3: shes rab de nyid dus nyid du yun ring po nas yongs su goms par byas pa yin no // / +shes rab yang pa ni de nyid tshad med pa dang mtha' yas ba'i spyod yul lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269823#269834#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7036;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7037;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7038# de la 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rtsol ba mi mnga' bar sems kyi chos 'byung ste zhes bya ba 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la rnam par rtog pa'i yid la byed par mi mnga' mod kyi / / +sngon gyi rgyu'i gnas skabs  kyi shes rab kyi stobs kyis rtsol ba mi mnga' bar yang sems kyi chos 'byung ste / /

column3: shes rab mnyam pa med pa ni gzhan dag dang mi mtshungs pa'i shes rab po // / +shes rab rin po che ni shes rab dbang po thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269835#269846#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7037;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7038;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7039# sngon gyi rgyu'i gnas skabs  kyi shes rab kyi stobs kyis rtsol ba mi mnga' bar yang sems kyi chos 'byung ste / / +dper na sprul pa lta bu'o // / +ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis phyir ni thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du mngon du 'gyur zhing yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis ni ma yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1374049#1374049#TD4037E.TXT.r_7737# ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod pa dang ldan na nyon mongs pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur zhing brtan pa'i stobs bskyed pa thob par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'khor los sgyur ba'i nor bu rnams kyi nang na bee d'u rya ltar 'od kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269845#269855#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7039;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7040# ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis phyir ni thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du mngon du 'gyur zhing yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis ni ma yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.017#TD4053E.TXT.r#2998488#2998489#TD4053E.TXT.r_4462;TD4053E.TXT.r_4463# mtshan mar gyur pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni ji skad bshad pa'i lus la sogs ba'i  mtshan ma'i rnam pa gzhan du bskyed pa'o // / +mtshan mar snang bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa mtshan mar snang ba ji skad du bstan pa dag bde ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs gzhan du bskyed pa'o // /
column6: 0.019#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2006341#2006341#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4145;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4146# legs par bshad pa la nyes par bshad  pa ston pa'i phyir la nyes par bshad pa la legs par bshad pa ston pa'i phyir log par ston pa'o // / +de las rnam pa gzhan du bstan pas ni brdzun smra bar 'gyur gyi dge 'dun gyi dbyen ni ma yin no // /
column7: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1374049#1374049#TD4037E.TXT.r_7737# ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod pa dang ldan na nyon mongs pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur zhing brtan pa'i stobs bskyed pa thob par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#819174#819174#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_8817# sems chung bas gsal bar 'gyur zhing mngon par 'gyur te / /
column9: 0.023#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2783923#2783923#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11531;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11532# shes pa sna tshogs la goms shing mkhas par yang 'gyur ro // / +'jig rten pa'i skyo ba'i rnam pa dag gis sems skyo bar yang 'gyur zhing / /
column10: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136354#1136354#TD4047E.TXT.r_2185;TD4047E.TXT.r_2186# skye bo'i tshogs chen po dag de'i tshig mnyan par 'dod par 'gyur zhing des smras  pa de byed par yang 'dod par 'gyur ba'o // / +de lta bu'i rim gyis dbang du 'gyur zhing 'dul bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: de dang ldan pa ni shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa'o // / +shes rab mig ni lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269856#269863#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7040;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7041# bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan du  na yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa na yid la byed pa mi mnga' mod kyi / /

column3: shes rab snang ba ni  gzhan las bsgrubs shing gzhan gyis skyed pa sbyor ba las byung ba'i shes rab gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269864#269874#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7041;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7042# mnyam par gzhag pa'i mdun rol na yid la byas pa'i stobs kyis sprul pa ston par mdzad do // /

column3: shes rab 'od ni shes rab de nyid sbyor ba las byung ba ste / / +thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba'o // / +shes rab gsal ba ni shes rab de nyid bsgoms pa las byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269875#269884#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7042;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7043;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7044# 'di yang de bzhin te rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi shes rab kyi stobs kyis sems kyi CHOS 'BYUNG BA'O // / +gzhan yang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358185#2358185#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5520# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382518#2382520#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8565;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8566# mdo las ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par gyeng ba zhes ma gsungs  pa ni ting nge 'dzin la sgrib par byed pa'i ring du gyur pa'i phyir dang  sgrib ba mchog ma yin pa'i phyir mdor bsdus nas ma gsungs so // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las rnam par gyeng ba lnga yod par bstan pa de yang skyon rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385730#2385730#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8913# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las lus kyi las kyis sems can rnams la log par sgrub pa'i ma rig pa zhes bstan pa yang don rnam pa gnyis te / /
column8: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385936#2385937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8932# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni sems rtse gcig pa myur du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa dang  thos PA DANG BSAMS PA DANG bsgoms pa brjed  par byed pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column9: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386181#2386182#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8959;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960# de'i gnas ngan len ces ston pas so // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // /
column10: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386554#2386556#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386796#2386797#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9021;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9022# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni bag chags phra mo'i sgrib pa zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column12: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387234#2387237#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9062# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las mtshan ma med pa'i mngon bar 'du byed pa zhes bshad pa dang  bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column13: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397726#2397728#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10290# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni / /
column14: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398618#2398618#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10395# kha cig ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba la brten nas sa re re la yang sgrib pa gsum gsum spangs nas yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa thob bar 'gyur ba las brtsams nas sa bcu gcig po dag ston te / /
column15: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398997#2398997#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10441# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column16: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399357#2399359#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10487;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10488# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha  rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang sbyar te / /
column17: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2401889#2401892#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10817;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10818# rgyu dang rkyen des yan lag de yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las / /
column18: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402253#2402255#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10870;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10871# chos kyi dbyings ye shes la dbang ba'i gnas kyi don kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur bas yan lag de'i phyir sa dgu  pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang sbyar na ma rig pa gnyis kyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sgrib par byed de / /
column19: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405105#2405105#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11160# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni rnam grangs gnyis kyis ston te / /
column20: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220521#220522#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_810;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_811# legs  pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshungs pa med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes  bstan te / /
column21: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222225#222228#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1054;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1055# de la tshogs zhes bya ba ni / / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las mngon par grub par byed pa'i don gyi phyir / /
column22: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224292#224292#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1343# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnams par grol ba'i mdo  dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column23: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224997#224998#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1438# yang na bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni bsdu  ba'i dngos po bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang yin pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis dge ba la 'jog par byed ces 'byung ngo // /
column24: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225535#225537#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1494# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /

column29: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358073#2358073#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5504# chos kyi sku thob pa dang  yongs su grub pa dang  yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa ni bstan bcos theg pa chen  po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa de'i 'gab lo dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las 'bras bu bzhi rnam par rtog par 'byung bas / /
column30: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391025#2391028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9511# gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba yang spong bar byed do zhes bstan pa dang  gzhan yang theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las gal te rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur na / /

column40: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387387#2387387#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9079# nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol pa'i sgrib pa zhes bstan pa ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /

column26: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477931#477932#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3632;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3633# mkhyen pa la 'dres pa mi mnga' ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan  pa rnams kyang yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las sems can rnams kyi mos pa tha dad pa la ltos nas / /
column27: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358147#2358147#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5514;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5515# bsgom pa rnam pa lngas logs shig tu 'bras bu'i ming rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa ste / / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column28: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2344366#2344367#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3894;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3895# sems shin tu sbyangs pa ni bcu gcig dge ba las shin tu sbyangs pa'i grangs su gtogs pa'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las lus yang zhing zo mdog bde ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu  sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bshad de / /
column29: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274195#274195#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7574# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang  lang gi che bsgyur ba las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column30: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#468816#468816#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2548;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2549# rdo'i snying po ni slob dpon yang dag bden pas rin po che kha dog dmar zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /
column31: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473483#473483#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3138# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms PA'I SHES RAB NI GO rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni dran pa chen po zhes bya'o // /
column32: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475460#475460#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3358;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3359# 'di ltar gsum po de dag ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams  cad mtshungs shing tha dad pa med pas de dag brnyes par gyur pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las gnas tha dad pa mi mnga' ba ni thams cad kyang ye shes rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column33: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475710#475710#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3384;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3385# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gcig las lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang  dag par gsungs pa'i chos 'jig par nus pa med pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column34: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227023#227023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1681;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1682# de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrubs nas byang chub la 'jug pa thob par byed pa dang  gzhan yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par 'jog par byed pas so zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid  med kyis 'grel pa las / /

column3: shes rab nor ni dbang phyug thams kyi na ngan dbang phyug gi mchog rab skyed pa dang  rang gi smes la dbang sgyur ba thob par byed pa dang nor thams cad kyi gtso bo dang     'jig rten pa'i nor thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i rgyu gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269951#269963#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7053;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7054;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7055;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7056;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7057# ji ltar sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba mdzad ce na / / +yid bzhin nor bu dang ni lha yi rnga // /

column3: shes rab rin po che ni ji skad du bshad pa'o // / +shes rab ral gri dang shes rab mtshon cha ni kun tu sbyor ba thams cad gcod par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269964#269974#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7056;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7057;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7058;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7059;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7060# sangs rgyas mdzad pa sna tshogs grub gyur kyang // / +rtag par dgongs pa mi mnga' de bzhin no // /

column3: shes rab mtshon cha ni nyon mongs pa dang  lha'i bu'i bdud ring du spong ba'o // / +shes rab  'debs pa ni yid kyi dbang po'i rta dge ba spyod par 'debs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269975#269986#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7060;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7061# tshigs su bcad pa 'di las yid bzhin nor bu dang  lha'i rnga'i dpe rnam pa gnyis kyis ni rnam par mi rtog     // /

column3: shes rab ltung bar byed pa ni lus thams cad dang bral ba dang  rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269987#269994#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7061# pa'i ye shes brnyes pa la rnam par mi rtog pa'i rtsol ba mi mnga' yang mdzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa ni dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang  lha'i rnga la 'di snyam du / /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269911#269911#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7049;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7050# mngon par 'du  mdzad pa mi mnga' yang phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te / / +dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang  lha'i rnga la yid la byed pa med kyang bya ba'i dngos po rnams mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes bshad do // /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475319#475319#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3339# dper na 'jig rten pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang lha'i rnga lta bu'o // /

column3: shes rab rab ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sgo du ma 'gog par zhugs pa'o // / +shes rab them skas ni sbyor ba las  byung ba'i lam mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269995#270008#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7061;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7062;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7063# pa'i ye shes brnyes pa la rnam par mi rtog pa'i rtsol ba mi mnga' yang mdzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa ni dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang  lha'i rnga la 'di snyam du / /

column3: shes rab khang bzangs ni mthar phyin par song ba'o // / +yang ra ba la sogs pa de dag nyid gtan la dbab pa'i phyir 'di gsum brjod par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270009#270022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7063# bdag gis sgra dbyung ngo snyam pa'i bsam pa med kyang  sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi las kyi mos pa'i mthu ci lta ba dang  brdung ba la mi ltos par yang 'od sna tshogs gtong zhing sgra sna tshogs 'byung ba ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin te / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +khams shes pa dang  khams sna tshogs shes pa dang  khams du ma shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270023#270032#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7063;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7064# bdag gis sgra dbyung ngo snyam pa'i bsam pa med kyang  sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi las kyi mos pa'i mthu ci lta ba dang  brdung ba la mi ltos par yang 'od sna tshogs gtong zhing sgra sna tshogs 'byung ba ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin te / /

column3: yang dag pa'i lta ba ni de  kho na nyid rab tu rtogs pa la slob pa'i shes rab gang yin pa'o // / +tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni de skyed par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270031#270040#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7063;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7064# bdag gis sgra dbyung ngo snyam pa'i bsam pa med kyang  sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi las kyi mos pa'i mthu ci lta ba dang  brdung ba la mi ltos par yang 'od sna tshogs gtong zhing sgra sna tshogs 'byung ba ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin te / / +rnam par rtog pa'i rtsol ba dang bral ba yin yang gdul ba'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams  kyi mos pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin du phan 'dogs pa'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs ston to zhes mngon par bsgrubs pa yin no zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: sems rnam par grol ba dang  shes rab rnam par grol ba ni gong ma ste / / +slob pa rnams kyi ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus bsdus pa dang  lan cig phyir  'ong ba dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus bsdus pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270041#270055#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7064;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7065# rnam par rtog pa'i rtsol ba dang bral ba yin yang gdul ba'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams  kyi mos pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin du phan 'dogs pa'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs ston to zhes mngon par bsgrubs pa yin no zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535268#535268#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11181# skyes nas kyang skad cig las lhag par bdag nyid gnas par mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238223#238223#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3103;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3104# zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las kyang de skad du bshad do // /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244503#244503#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3913;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3914# ces bshad pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel    pa las kyang phal cher de skad du bstan to // /

column3: mi slob pa rnams kyi ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bus bsdus pa'o // / +rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni rang sangs rgyas kyis bsdus pa'o // / +sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub dam pas bsdus pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246680#246683#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4171# de  nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271009#271012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7162;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7163# gand'i'i sgra med mod kyi 'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis gand'i brdungs pas ting nge 'dzin las ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das  la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273175#273178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7447# rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu 'byung ba ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das  la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column17: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272613#272616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7382;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7383# mdo'i tshig dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column18: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267922#267925#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6782;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6783# 'di ltar rjes su mthun pa'i chos la yon tan ji snyed yod  pa gang yin pa de ni bsngags pa brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: de la ji ltar na  khams shes bar bya ba yin zhe na / / +smras pa / /

column7: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237249#237249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2971;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2972# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // / +bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams longs spyod pas ma 'tshal ba dang ldan pa dang  snying rje chen pos yongs su grub pa lags  na ; /

column3: khams du ma dang  khams sna tshogs shes par bya ste / / +khams bco brgyad ces bya ba ni khams du ma shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270074#270086#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7067;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7068;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7069# bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku mngon par 'du bgyi ba thams cad dang bral te / /
