column21: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267922#267925#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6782;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6783# 'di ltar rjes su mthun pa'i chos la yon tan ji snyed yod  pa gang yin pa de ni bsngags pa brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column22: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272613#272616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7382;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7383# mdo'i tshig dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: spong ldan ni spong ba de dag la lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'o // / +mi 'da' ba ni bslab pa'i tshogs thams cad rnam par 'byed par  mi byed cing mi spong ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271019#271032#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7164;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7165# bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku la sems mchis zhes bgyi'am / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271440#271441#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7224# bcom ldan 'das de  bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gang lags pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gang lags pa de nyid la bye brag tu bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid ston to // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248692#248694#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4401# bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sprul pa'i sku bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238726#238726#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248421#248422#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4376# bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis  pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2370021#2370022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7038# bcom ldan 'das thos pa las byung ba'i  shes rab kyis don so so yang dag par rig ba gang lags pa dang  bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis don so so yang dag par rig pa gang lags pa dang  zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis don so so yang dag par rig pa gang lags pa de dag la bye brag tu  bgyi ba ci mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa shes rab rnam pa gsum gyis don so so yang dag par rig pa ston to // /

column3: rnam par mi 'da' ba ni phyogs 'ga' yang 'phan mi 'byin zhing mi spong ba'o // / +gnas pa ni sems 'jog par byed pa gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271033#271043#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7167;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7168# sems ma mchis zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku la sems mnga' ba ston to // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271922#271923#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7295;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7296# 'di yang rnam pa bzhi ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang brtag pa dang  rnam par bshad pa ste / /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269493#269493#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6986# zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang   bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa ste / /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2372506#2372506#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7353# de la dang po mtshan ma rnams rab tu sel ba yang rnam pa bzhir de bya ste zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  rnam par bshad pa ste / /

column3: yang dag par 'jog pa ni yang dag par 'jog pa gang yin pa ste / / +rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste / / +nyan thos kyi sa las sems     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271044#271061#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7167;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7168;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7169;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7170;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7171# zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtags pa dang rnam par bshad pa ste / / +'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /

column3: gnas pa rnam pa dgu 'byung ba bzhin du rtogs par bya'o // / +sdom ni / /
shes dang ston dang dge ba dang / / +'dun dang brtun dang gcig pu dang / / +rdul bral nad dang snang ba dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271062#271071#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7170;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7171;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7172;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7173# sprul pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir re // / +sku gnyis po 'di dag sems mnga' ba zhes bgyi'am / /

column3: bdag dang sred bcad skye ba zad // / +lhar bcas skye bo mang po dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271072#271079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7172;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7173;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7174;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7175# 'on te sems mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272715#272715#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7390;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7391# theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus las ni dngos po 'di  dag mi 'byung lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248444#248445#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4379# 'di ni dang po sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column7: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269532#269534#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6990;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6991;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6992# de'i 'og tu sprul pa'i sems mnga' ba yang yin mi mnga' ba yang yin par ston pa'i phyir  'dir sems bstan pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252138#252139#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4746;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4747# rnam pa  sna tshogs su bshad pa 'byung ba ni mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column9: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271466#271466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7228# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / / +rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ni 'di lta ste / /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273619#273620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7487;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7488# 'di ni dang po zhing yongs su dag pa dang ma dag pa dag na dngos po gang dkon pa dang mod pa cig car zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column11: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273327#273327#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7459;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7460# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / / +rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i mthus byin gyis brlabs nas lam gang dang bsgrub pa gang gis thams cad du  sems can rnams lus phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dag ci rigs par de dag la lam de dang bsgrub pa de yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / /
column12: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#268169#268169#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6809# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub  sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column13: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272366#272366#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7358;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7359# 'og nas lan du gsungs pa'i tshig dang  sbyar na dgongs pa rnam pa 'di gsum yod do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /

column3: phung po dang ni ngar 'dzin  pa'o ; / / +shes pa zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i tha snyad sngon du 'gro ba'i shes rab po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271080#271088#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7174;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7176;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7177# rigs kyi bu sems yod pa yang ma yin / / +sems med pa yang ma yin NO ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan mdor gsungs pa ste / /

column3: mthong ba ni mthong ba'i tha snyad sngon du 'gro ba'i shes rab po // / +rig pa ni bye brag phyed pa'i tha snyad sngon du 'gro ba'i shes rab po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271089#271098#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7176;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7177;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7178# sems med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan mdor gsungs pa ste / / +yod  ces byar yang mi rung la / / +med ces byang yang mi rung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i tha snyad sngon du 'gro ba'i shes rab po // / +ye  shes ni lkog tu gyur pa shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271097#271112#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7177;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7180# med ces byang yang mi rung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni gsum pa gtan tshigs brtag pa ste / /

column3: mthong ba ni mngon du mngon sum du gyur ba mthong ba'o // / +rig pa ni ma rig pa las bzlog pa'i bye brag tu rtogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271105#271117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7180# yod pa dang med pa zhes gsungs kyang gtan tshigs ma gsungs pa'i phyir 'dir brtag pa yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271168#271170#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7187;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7188;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7184;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7185;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7186# lta ba'i rnam pa yang dag pa'i sems med     // / +pa'i phyir ni bdag nyid la brten pa'i sems med pa zhes bya ba gsungs so // /
column6: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1462384#1462384#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7294# sems pa la sogs pa yod  na sems yod pa'i phyir dang med na yang med pa'i phyir la / /

column3: blo ni yang dag par yod pa'i don shes pa'o // / +rtogs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271116#271134#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7180;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7181;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7182# bdag nyid la brten pa'i sems med  pa'i phyir dang  gzhan la brten pa'i sems yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bshad pa'o // /
column5: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#828431#828431#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10271# snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kho nas de la gegs byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / /
column6: 0.018#TD4097E.TXT.r#2223983#2223983#TD4097E.TXT.r_2854# chad kyis 'jigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de la thar pa'i 'du shes med pas sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'gog pa la byis pa dag chad par sems te skrag go // /
column7: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#878855#878856#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18059# mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'i btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug dang ldan no zhes bya ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'i sems thob pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#1522449#1522449#TD4061E.TXT.r_1319;TD4061E.TXT.r_1320# 'chi ba ni bzang po ma yin zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // / +de la sems nyams pa dang rmongs pas 'chi ba'i phyir dang  bsod nams ma byas par 'chi 'pho ba'i phyir dang  'gro ba mi 'dod par 'gro ba'i phyir go rims bzhin du  'chi ba ni bzang po ma yin / /
column9: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231066#231066#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2182# snying rje med pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  rtag  tu mi byed pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  ma gus pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o // /
column10: 0.025#TD4071E.TXT.r#408065#408065#TD4071E.TXT.r_1390;TD4071E.TXT.r_1391# ji ltar mdo sde pa kha cig 'dod pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni / / +de lta bur sems dang bcas par 'dod do zhes bya ba lhag ma'o // /
column11: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256401#256404#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5265# lhung ba'i gnas lta bu'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsum pa lhung ba'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /
column12: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924814#924814#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4367# bdag nyid de la dga' bas lhag par rtogs pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba la / /
column13: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#767104#767105#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_54# rang gi ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni dgos pa'o // /
column14: 0.028#TD4018E.TXT.r#3030391#3030391#TD4018E.TXT.r_3483# sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thams cad mkhyen pa mchog tu yongs su dag cing 'dod chags dang bral ba gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang po cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mtha' med pa'i sems  can rnams mgu bar mdzad pa'i phyir gnyis pa dang  mi gnyis pa'i chos rgol ba dang  lan gdab pa dang  tshad ma dang  gzhal bya la sogs pa'i tshul dang  phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba dang  byang chub kyi phyogs  kyi khyad par du 'chad pa dang  snang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba dang  gang zag la bdag med pa kho na nyid la gzhol bar chos 'chad do // /
column15: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1473223#1473223#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8549;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8550# mi dge ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du  sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu dmigs pa dang bcas pa 'bras bu 'dzin par byed la 'byin par mi byed pa yang yod de zhes bya ba mu bzhi'o // / +mu dang po ni mi dge ba'i mjug thogs su dge ba'am lung du ma bstan pa'i sems    mngon du mi byed pa'o // /
column16: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1165518#1165518#TD4047E.TXT.r_6517# bdag la gnod par bya ba'am zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid 'chi bar bya ba'i phyir slong ba'o // /

column3: shes rab gang yin pa ni lhan  cig skyes pa'i shes rab gang yin pa ste skyes nas thob pa'o // /
column4: 0.018#TD4036E.TXT.r#47785#47785#TD4036E.TXT.r_7292# sems kun du gdung bar 'gyur ba'i yin la byed pa dang  sems mngon par brlan par 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pa dang  shin tu sbyang pa skyed pa'i yid la byed pa dang  ye shes dang mthong ba rnams par sbyong ba'i yid la byed pas so // /
column5: 0.019#TD4032E.TXT.r#1933071#1933072#TD4032E.TXT.r_2146;TD4032E.TXT.r_2147# de la  srid pa la chags pa dang  longs spyod la chags pas ni bde 'gror sems sngo bar byed do // /
column6: 0.020#TD4088E.TXT.r#2828145#2828146#TD4088E.TXT.r_707;TD4088E.TXT.r_708# ji ltar 'di na kha cig gang la kun nas mnar sems dang  khro ba'i sems yod pa'i phyir / / +de las ma byin par  len par byed do // /
column7: 0.021#TD4066E.TXT.r#2105243#2105243#TD4066E.TXT.r_445# gzugs dang byed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin du zin kyang rang kun  nas slong ba'i sems rnam par rig par byed pa bzhin du gzhan la rnam par rig par mi byed pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#855576#855577#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14549;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14550# 'byung ba'i sems ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pas    zhes bya ba la / / +'byung ba'i sems ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems rgyun chad pa'i sems te / /
column9: 0.022#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1987852#1987852#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1314# sems gzhan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems las gzhan pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o // /
column10: 0.024#TD4043E.TXT.r#375795#375795#TD4043E.TXT.r_2656# de lta bas na sde pa gzhan dag gis bsgos pa'i rjes su 'gro ba mthong la theg pa chen po'i ma mo la ltos shig dang  de las ni yongs su 'dris par byas pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su gzugs med pa dag la snyoms par 'jug go  zhes gsungs so // /
column11: 0.024#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1408252#1408254#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_932;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_933# gyengs pa ni gang zag ste sems gyengs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +sems gyengs pa zhes bya ba ni de las  gzhan pa'i sems kyi yang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i sems las gzhan pa'i sems kyi yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column12: 0.024#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2744878#2744878#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6214# gal te gsod pa'i bsam pas de bzhin gshegs pa lang na sems kyis khrag 'byin par  byed pa ni srog gcod pa'i gzhi las lci ba yin par brjod par bya'o // /
column13: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1981549#1981550#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_396;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_397# 'di ltar thal mo sbyar ba la sogs pa gyo ba med pas kyang go bar byed la / / +rang kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems rig par byed pas kyang rnam par rig byed ces bya na / /
column14: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2767556#2767556#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9375;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9376# de la dang pos ni khon dang bcas pa dang   nyes rtsom gyi sems kyis bde ba la reg par mi gnas par blta bar bya'o // / +gnyis pas ni nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung bas bdag nyid bde ba la reg par mi gnas par blta bar bya'o // /
column15: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#13335#13335#TD4036E.TXT.r_1962;TD4036E.TXT.r_1963;TD4036E.TXT.r_1964# mdo'i sde dang  dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang  lung du bstan pa'i sde dang  rgyas par snga ma bzhin du chos gang dag thos shing bzung la bstan par byas pa'am // / +kha ton bya ba'am / / +yid kyis brtags pa dang  mthong bas shin tu rtogs par byed pa de dag las  rnam grangs du mar 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang  'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  'dod pa la zhen pa dang  'dod pa la 'chums pa dang  'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa la rnam par smad pa dang  rnam par mi snyan par brjod pa dang  rnam par skyon du bgrang ba dang  'dod pa  la 'dod chags dang  'dod pa la 'dun pa spong ba rnam grangs du mar bstod pa dang  bsngags pa dang rab tu bsngags pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'du gnas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa yin te / /
column16: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#20328#20328#TD4036E.TXT.r_2993# ma 'ongs pa la lta ba dang  'bras bu mthong ba'i dad pas sbyin par byed pa dang  'dod pa'i sems kyis gus par sbyin par byed pa dang  brnyas pa med par rang gi lag  nas sbyin par byed pa dang  ci nas kyang de gzhan dag la mkho bar 'gyur ba'i dus su sbyin par byed pa dang  chos dang mthun pa dang  gzu lums ma yin pas legs par bsgrubs te / /
column17: 0.026#TD4018E.TXT.r#3010331#3010331#TD4018E.TXT.r_842;TD4018E.TXT.r_843# de dag yod pa nyid de 'bras bur 'brel bar byed pa  nges pa'i phyir ro // / +de dag don dam par yod pa ma yin par ji ltar yid ches par bya zhes 'dri ba la / /
column18: 0.026#TD4018E.TXT.r#3059386#3059386#TD4018E.TXT.r_7178;TD4018E.TXT.r_7179# de la tshangs pa ni gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin mi gnyis pa'i sems su dgongs pa'o // / +bdag ni brtags par yod pa'i phyir / /
column19: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1169088#1169088#TD4047E.TXT.r_7061;TD4047E.TXT.r_7062# sems nye bar brtan par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed pa mdor bsdus nas bstan pa'i phyir / /
column20: 0.026#TD4044E.TXT.r#393009#393010#TD4044E.TXT.r_2099;TD4044E.TXT.r_2100# thog ma 'jug pa nas zhes bya ba ni sngon ma zhugs par sems pa las 'jug pa ni thog ma 'jug pa'o // / +rmongs par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bsam par mi nus pa'i sems pa'o // /
column21: 0.027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117025#3117025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3638;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3639;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3640# byams pa de la mtshan ma phra mo ni 'di dag yin te / / +sems kyi  len pa'i mtshan ma'am / / +myong ba'i mtshan ma'am / /
column22: 0.027#TD4062E.TXT.r#2963630#2963630#TD4062E.TXT.r_399# de yang yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa dag na lus nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa'i rnam par  shes pa zhes bya'o // /
column23: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2374189#2374189#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7529# 'di ltar thos pa las byung  ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems dang  bsams pa las byung ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems so // /
column24: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#124936#124936#TD4035E.TXT.r_20# rtog pa yang med la  dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa dang  mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa dang  mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa dang  sems yod pa'i sa dang  sems med pa'i sa dang  thos pa las byung ba'i sa dang  bsams pa     // /
column25: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2784490#2784491#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11611;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11612# de bzhin  du sa gong ma sa lhag ma rnams kyi dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su sa gong ma pa'i sems dag kyang skye bar blta bar bya'o // / +'dod pa na spyod pa'i lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su yang gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems 'byung ste / /
column26: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1446601#1446601#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5484# dge ba'i sems skye bas ni ji ltar na mngon sum mam brgyud pas sems de rang skyed par rung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nus pa'i khyad par can gyi sems  mi dge ba bskyed par 'gyur bas sa bon ni nus pa'i khyad par kho nar zad kyi sa bon zhes bya ba cung zad med de / /
column27: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392034#2392034#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9617;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9618# de la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes par byed pa'i sems so // / +skye ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes par bya ba'i sems te / /
column28: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2557183#2557183#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_2540# brgyad dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni brnab sems la sogs pa dang ldan pa srog gcod pa la sogs pa drug la sbyor ba byas nas 'dod pas log par  gyem pa bdag nyid kyis byed la mnyam du mthar phyin par 'gyur na'o // /
column29: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1192099#1192100#TD4047E.TXT.r_10123# mthong ba dang thos pas kyang sems mngon par dang bar byed na zhes bya ba ni dad par bya ba'i gnas su bstan pa yin te / /
column30: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#948039#948039#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7427# phung po nyid mu stegs kyis brtags pa'i bdag rtag pa'i rang bzhin med pas na bdag med pa'o // /
column31: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2741025#2741025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5692# 'di ltar 'di na kha cig bdag nyid kyi lus la sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa'am sems la gnod pa'i zhe 'gras pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal gyi gnas skabs de nyid yid  la byed dam / /
column32: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#882142#882143#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18536;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18537# sems can de dag 'du shes bskyed nas gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar  'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i lung gis kyang sems med pa la 'chi 'pho med do zhes shes par byed do // / +sems 'chad pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la / /
column33: 0.028#TD4071E.TXT.r#399504#399504#TD4071E.TXT.r_62;TD4071E.TXT.r_63;TD4071E.TXT.r_64# de ni de la dmigs pa yang yin la sems kyang yin pas de la dmigs pa'i  sems te / / +'jug par byed pa'i sems so // / +de las skyes pas na de la dmigs pa'i sems las skyes pa yin te // /
column34: 0.028#TD4095E.TXT.r#64067#64067#TD4095E.TXT.r_207# sems gyengs pa zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i sems pa'i yang yin  pa'o ; / /
column35: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#777582#777582#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1770;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1771;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1772# gyengs dang sems med pa yi yang // / +zhes bya ba ste / / +ma gyengs pa sems  dang bcas pa'i yang yin no zhes bya bar mngon no // /
column36: 0.029#TD4097E.TXT.r#2224337#2224337#TD4097E.TXT.r_2908;TD4097E.TXT.r_2909# bsgribs pa'i sems mngon du  byed pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems mngon du byed pa'o // / +sa 'og ma pa'i zag pa med pa'i sems mngon du byed pa ni srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa pa'i zag pa med pa'i sems mngon du byed pa'o // /
column37: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1446146#1446146#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5428;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5429# su zhig tsha ba dang me don tha dad pa ma yin pa las tsha ba kho na sreg par byed pa yin gyi me ni ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur / / +dge ba'i sa bon yang mi dge ba'am lung du ma bstan pa'i sems la yod la / /

column3: snang ba'i sbyor ba las yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab gang yin pa'o // / +mngon par rtogs pa ni chos mngon par rtogs pa dang ldan pa chos rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271133#271148#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7181;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7182;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7183;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7184# de la bdag nyid la brten pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i sems te / / +bdag nyid kyis dmigs pa'i byed pa lta ba'i rnam pa'i sa bon la brten  nas skye ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa nang gi so so'i nang  gi shes rab gang yin pa'o // / +ston pa ni dris pa lung ston pa gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271145#271160#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7183;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7184;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7185;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7186# gzhan la brten pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i mtshan gyi rnam pa'i sems te / /
column5: 0.023#TD4020E.TXT.r#2530867#2530867#TD4020E.TXT.r_2564;TD4020E.TXT.r_2565;TD4020E.TXT.r_2566# yon tan khyad par can gyi ni // / +sgrib pa'i gnyen por sgom pa'o // / +yang dag gnas pa la brten nas // /

column3: 'dogs par byed pa ni lung ston par 'dod pa'i ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams mthar gyis legs par sdeb par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.020#TD4064E.TXT.r#425077#425077#TD4064E.TXT.r_1308# de la 'dzin  pa'i sems med pa dang  gzung ba'i don mi dmigs pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.020#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2591348#2591348#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6950;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6951# sbubs can med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // / +sems med pa rnams la yang sems med pa'i phyir  med do // /
column6: 0.027#TD4095E.TXT.r#76718#76718#TD4095E.TXT.r_2732;TD4095E.TXT.r_2733# sems med pa la yang med de / / +sems med pa la gnod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: rab tu 'jog par byed pa ni mthar gyis legs par bsdebs pa rnams  ston par byed pa'o // / +bye brag tu 'grel pa ni bstan pa rnams bye brag tu ston par byed cing don 'chad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271169#271183#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7187;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7188;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7189# lta ba'i rnam pa yang dag pa'i sems med     // / +pa'i phyir ni bdag nyid la brten pa'i sems med pa zhes bya ba gsungs so // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#525315#525319#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9898;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9899# yang dag pa'i nus pa med par 'gyur te / / +rgyu mtshan gyi rnam pa'i sems la sogs pas dmigs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.023#TD4025E.TXT.r#2168005#2168005#TD4025E.TXT.r_337# gang zhig de ltar med pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi dmigs pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang  yod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa don dam  pa'i bden pa mthong ba'i phyir gnyis ka bsal ba med pa dang  bzhag pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par byang chub pa de ni gang zhig skyes pas cig shos gtan bral ba dang med par rtogs par 'gyur ba kho na mthong ba'i gegs kyi  rnam pa 'di mtha' dag gi gnyen por rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096503#3096503#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_663# gal te rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa'i nye bar 'dogs pa spong ba yin na / /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#540144#540144#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11821# de las zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyu mtshan gyi rnam pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu mtshan zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2348642#2348642#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4334# 'di ltar  rgyun chags su yid la byed pa thos pa dang  bsams pa'i shes rab dang bcas pa'i sems kyi rgyu mtshan gyi rnam pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: rnam par 'grel ba ni gzhan gyi the tshom skyes so cog sel bar byed pa'o // / +gsal bar byed pa ni don dang tshig dang zab mo yang dang yang du rtogs par byas nas rab tu ston par byed  pa'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271184#271192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7189;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7190# gzhan du brten pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi rnam pa'i sems yod pa'i phyir ni med ces byar mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271193#271200#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7190;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7191# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2322426#2322426#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1367# stong  pa nyid gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir ni med ces byar mi rung ngo // /

column3: ston par byed pa ni snying brtse bas ma dris ma bcol bar chos 'chad bar byed cing kun tu ston pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271201#271213#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7191;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7192;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7193# sprul pa dang gzhan longs  spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de la yang dag pa'i sems dang  sems las byung ba mi mnga' yang / /

column3: yang dag par rab tu ston pa ni bar chad med par ston pa'o // / +slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi byed pa ni 'chab pa mi byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271212#271222#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7192;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7193# sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos lta bur snang ste / / +bla na med pa'i byang chub de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu shin tu bsam par dka' ba'i phyir gzugs med pa'i chos sprul cing ston par byed do // /
column5: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#962096#962098#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9302# bdag nyid sam skri ta'i skad la mkhas pa'i sgo nas bdag la mkhas pa gzhan dag yid ches par bya ba dang  sgra'i gtsug lag shes par rlom pa'i mu stags pa dag tshar gcad par bya ba dang  don gcig la nges pa'i tshig mang po bstan cing bshad pa'i  chos tha snyad la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir tshol bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#804577#804577#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6320;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6321# kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang pos nye bar spyod par byed de / / +mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pas phye ba'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#38980#38980#TD4036E.TXT.r_5841;TD4036E.TXT.r_5842# bskyod du zin kyang log par bsgrub pa'i phyir / / +des ni 'phags pa'i lam skyed PAR MI BYED DO // /
column8: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2734805#2734805#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5001# chos rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'jug par byed cing chos  rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'jug par byed pas khams rnams te 'phen par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column9: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125680#3125680#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4738# des kyang de byed la mi  byed na yang log pa'i chos yongs su bsngo bas yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: thog mar dge ba ni nyan pa rnams rab tu dga' ba    skyed pa'o // / +bar du dge ba ni rab tu sbyor ba rnams tshegs chung ngus mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa dbu ma'i lam la yang dag par brten pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271221#271236#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7193;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7194# bla na med pa'i byang chub de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu shin tu bsam par dka' ba'i phyir gzugs med pa'i chos sprul cing ston par byed do // /

column3: tha mar dge ba ni shin tu dri ma med pa dang  shin tu mthar phyin pa'i phyir dang  thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang  shin tu 'dod chags  dang bral ba'i mthar gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271237#271251#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7194;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7195;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7196# gal te de  ma yin na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa ston par mdzad de snga nas gtan du spangs pa'i phyir ro // / +ji ltar nyan thos dang byol song la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i sems shes par nus te / /

column3: don bzang po ni phan pa dang  bde ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // / +tshig 'bru bzang po ni ming gi tshogs la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba dang  tshig tu 'don pa zur phyin pa dang ldan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271252#271264#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7196;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7197# mnyam pa nyid du byang chub sems  dpas kyang shes par mi nus pa'i phyir / /

column3: ma 'dres pa ni 'di las phyi rol pa rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'o // / +yongs su rdzogs pa ni tshad med pa'i phyir thams cad kyi mchog tu byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271265#271274#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7197;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7198;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7199# des na mdo dag las rigs dpag tu med pa dag sprul nas thams cad kyang sems yod pa lta bur ston to zhes gsungs pa yin te / /

column3: yongs su dag pa ni rang bzhin rnam par grol ba'o // / +yongs su byang ba ni rgyud rnam par grol ba'o // / +tshangs par spyod pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271275#271283#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7198;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7199;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7200# 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo la sogs pa las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // / +gzhan  yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni phrin las rnam pa gsum ston par mdzad do zhes gsungs te / /

column3: de ni ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa la sogs pas  mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhir bstan to // / +nyon la zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid de lta bu'i chos la rna gtod par yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271284#271299#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7199;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7200;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7201;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7202# gzhan  yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni phrin las rnam pa gsum ston par mdzad do zhes gsungs te / / +'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo la sogs pa las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: shin tu legs par zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa dang  rgyun mi 'chad pa dang  gus par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang yang dag par sbyor bar  byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271298#271308#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7201;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7202# gzhan yang sprul pa gzhan la brten pa'i sems yod par gsungs te / / +gzhan gyi yang dag pa'i sems la brten nas rgyu mtshan gyi rnam par snang ba'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.026#TD4029E.TXT.r#2145262#2145262#TD4029E.TXT.r_3198# dmigs pa ni sems yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pas sems rnam pa drug po dmigs par snang bar rnam par gzhag go // /

column3: 'dun pa drag po ni nam zhig na gnas te zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o // / +dga' ba drag po ni yang dag par sbyor ba la dga' ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271309#271319#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7202;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7203;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7204# gzhan gyi yang dag pa'i sems la brten nas rgyu mtshan gyi rnam par snang ba'i phyir te / / +mdo 'di nyid la sogs pa las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: rab tu dga' ba drag po ni ston par byed pa ston pa'am bla ma'i gnas lta bu la rab tu dga' ba'o // / +dang ba drag po ni chos ston pa  dang gdams ngag rjes su ston pa la dang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271320#271333#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7204;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7205;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7206;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7207# sprul pa la dbang po dang  sems la sogs pa med par gsungs kyang / /

column3: brtun par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa myur bar bya ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271332#271341#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7206;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7207# de bzhin gshegs pa  las brtsams pa ni ma yin no // / +gzhan sprul pa'i dbang po gzugs can dang  sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos la dbang po la stsogs pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir yod pa nyid du ma bstan to zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: sang bya'o sang bya'o zhes mi sdod par brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271340#271349#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7207;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7208# gzhan sprul pa'i dbang po gzugs can dang  sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos la dbang po la stsogs pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir yod pa nyid du ma bstan to zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: rjes su brtson par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni / / +ji ltar bslab pa dang  mnyam pa'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271350#271358#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7208;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7209;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7210# 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel ba las phal cher de skad du ston to // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column3: lhag par rab tu sbyor gyi / / +chung ngur ni ma yin no // / +spang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen po bsgom pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271359#271369#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7210;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7211;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7212;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7213# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku sems mchis pa zhig lags sam / /

column3: nang du yang dag gzhag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bas mtha'i gnas mal dag tu ma 'dres par gnas shing ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba la ting nge 'dzin gang     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256223#256225#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5242# yang dag par blang ba'i spyod lam bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag par blang ba'i chos bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271367#271381#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7211;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7212;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7213;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7214;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7215# sems ma mchis pa lags / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column6: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270214#270215#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7085;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7086# sngon shes rab  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column7: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334726#2334726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column8: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384463#2384463#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column9: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384830#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column10: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column11: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403468#2403471#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11009# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni snang ba'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column12: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405615#2405615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11202;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11203# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nam mkha' lta bu'i nyes pa dag la ni sprin chen po lta bu'i chos kyi skus  kun du khyab pas zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems can nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa las byung ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs la / /
column13: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227468#227468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# ba'i thabs kyi brtson 'grus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column14: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228689#228689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1881# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par  rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column15: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228866#228866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column16: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228981#228981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column17: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1988# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column18: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230802#230802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155# drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// /
column19: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247471#247471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4260# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang  MNGON PAR 'DU BYA BA med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column20: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248951#248951#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4431# bdud btul ba dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang / /
column21: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258662#258662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column22: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260979#260979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5879# yod par gyur pa'i grub pa dang  bya ba'i dngos po grub pa dang  grogs byas te grub pa dang  chos kyis grub pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column23: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273162#273162#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7445# mtshams  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column3: la brten nas gnyen po bsgom pa'o // / +gcig pu ni dben pa'i gnas mal du song ba gnyis lhan cig tu mi gnas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271019#271026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7164;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7165# bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku la sems mchis zhes bgyi'am / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271382#271391#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7214;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7215;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7216# dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas sprul pa'i sku de sems mchis pa zhes bgyi'am / /

column3: ma 'dres pa ni nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i yid la byed pa la kun tu mi spyod pa'o // / +bag yod pa ni 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa  la sogs pa sdig pa can gyi chos las sems srung ba dang  dge ba la yang dag par sbyor ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271390#271399#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7215;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7216;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7217;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7218;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7219# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas sprul pa'i sku de sems mchis pa zhes bgyi'am / / +sems ma mchis pa zhes bgyi lags / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271400#271407#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7218;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7219;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7220;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7221# sems yod ces bya bar yang mi rung la / / +sems med ces bya bar yang mi  rung ngo ; / /

column3: bstan pa can ni snga ma bzhin no // / +bdag nyid gtod pa ni sgrib pa lnga spangs nas sems nang du rab tu gtod pa dang 'das bla na med pa'i grub pa dang bde ba la sems gtod pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246682#246683#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4171# de  nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248404#248407#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4375# de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni bag chags gtan du spangs pas rab tu che ba yin pas des na mdo sde dang bstan bcos dag las so so nas don re re smos pas phan tshun 'gal  ba med do zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248677#248679#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4400# byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la  'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251743#251745#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4703# byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221160#221167#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_889;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_890;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_891;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_892# du ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab par bsdu  lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column7: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236136#236141#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2845# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column8: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385110#2385112#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8844;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8845;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8846# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar du sgrib pa gang dag gi gnyen por gyur pa lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgrib pa bcu gcig gi gnyen por gyur pas bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston te / / +'di yang  rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column10: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225873#225874#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column11: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231004#231005#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2176# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column12: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246079#246082#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4097;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4098# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan  te ; /
column13: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380395#2380396#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8306;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8307;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8308# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong 'di dag gis ting  nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa du zhig sdud par bgyid lags ces pa 'di man chad ni bcu gsum pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis ting nge 'dzin gzhan rnams bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i sgo zhes bya bar ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column14: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391885#2391886#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9596;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9597;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9598# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sgrub par bgyid na byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang  yon tan yangs shing rgya cher  rab tu 'dren par 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa mthu dang yon tan yangs shing rgya che ba'i bar du 'dren pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column16: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273601#273605#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7486;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7487# dngos po gang ni dka' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bdun pa zhing yongs su dag pa dang zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag na gang    dag rnyed par dka' ba dang  gang dag mod pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column17: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272277#272279#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7351;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7352# de bzhin gshegs pa dang de dag tu rgyu dang rkyen ci zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column18: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236672#236674#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2908# ni bcu gsum pa pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi srid par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column19: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245241#245245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4001# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /
column20: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273238#273238#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7451# bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa lta bu zhig mchis dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems  can gyi lus yongs su 'dzin pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column3: yang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal de dang  mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa ni rdul lo // / +phyogs gnyis ka'i gnas ngan len ni dri ma'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271454#271469#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7224;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7225;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7226;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7228# bcom ldan 'das de  bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gang lags pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gang lags pa de nyid la bye brag tu bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol pa dang   lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column5: 0.009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262816#262818#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6129;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6130;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6131;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6132# 'di ltar gong ma lnga pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i skabs  nas thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gsungs pas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba mtshan nyid rnam pa du dang ldan pa khong du ma chud pas de'i phyir 'dir yang bzlas te bstan pa yin no // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column6: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219905#219906#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_746;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_747# bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni smon lam rgya chen po dang   smon lam gya nom pa dang  smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bka' stsal lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa smon lam rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas sa rnam par dbye ba bstan to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs ba ste / /
column7: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380396#2380396#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8306;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8307;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8308# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong 'di dag gis ting  nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa du zhig sdud par bgyid lags ces pa 'di man chad ni bcu gsum pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis ting nge 'dzin gzhan rnams bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i sgo zhes bya bar ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column8: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391886#2391886#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9596;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9597;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9598# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sgrub par bgyid na byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang  yon tan yangs shing rgya cher  rab tu 'dren par 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa mthu dang yon tan yangs shing rgya che ba'i bar du 'dren pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column17: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253710#253711#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4968# dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste  bshad pa bstan te / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /
column18: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378247#2378248#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8063;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8064;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8065# zhus pa dang  lan dag gis mtshan ma yongs su bsal ba rnam par grol  ba rnam par 'byed pa dang  rigs kyi bu gtso bo'i dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba man chad gzhan gyis brgal ba'i the tshom gcod pa'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column22: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223693#223693#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1266;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1267;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1268# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi grangs 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa dang  pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po dag gi grangs 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa'o // / +dang po la yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa ste / /

column3: chos rnams la zhes bya ba ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid du gnas pa dag  la'o // / +chos kyi mig ni chos tsam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon sum du nyams su myong ba can gyi shes rab po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271469#271481#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7228;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7229;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7230;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7231# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / / +rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ni 'di lta ste / /
