column3: dang po ni rgyu pa'i zhabs so // / +tha     // / +ma ni gnas pa'i zhabs te / / +de la sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang  'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ni spyod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272390#272397#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7360;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7361# rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi de dag gi lhag par bya ba'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang  sprul pa'i sku de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin pa'i  phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste / / +lan du gsungs pa 'di bshad pa yang gong du zhu ba gsol ba la rnam pa gsum du bshad pa dang sbyar na go rims bzhin du 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gsum yod de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272397#272405#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7361;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7362# lan du gsungs pa 'di bshad pa yang gong du zhu ba gsol ba la rnam pa gsum du bshad pa dang sbyar na go rims bzhin du 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gsum yod de / /

column3: dbang po'i sgo bsrungs pa ni bzlog pa'o // / +de gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba med pa gsum dang bsnyel ba med pa'i chos  yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272404#272416#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7361;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7362;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7363;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7364# lan du gsungs pa 'di bshad pa yang gong du zhu ba gsol ba la rnam pa gsum du bshad pa dang sbyar na go rims bzhin du 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gsum yod de / / +kha cig na re sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can de    dag la rkyen rnam pa gnyis po bdag po'i rkyen dang  dmigs pa'i rkyen mdzad do // /

column3: bsam gtan dag gis spyod pa drag po bkag pa'i phyir 'jig rten la nyes pa mi spyod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272417#272430#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7364;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7365;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7366# sems can rnams ni sprul pa'i sku bdag po'i rkyen dang  dmigs pa'i rkyen mdzad nas bsod nams skye bar 'gyur bas so / /

column3: bde bar gshegs pa ni yun ring po nas rnam pa thams cad du bdag dang gzhan la phan par dgyes pa'o // / +'jig rten mkhyen pa ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa  ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272430#272439#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7365;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7366# rgyu'i rkyen dang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni ma yin te / / +lus tha dad pa dag phan tshun  ltos na rgyu'i rkyen ma yin pa'i phyir dang  skal pa mtshungs pa rnams kyi sems la sogs pa dus mtshungs par skye ba'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de la sems can ni sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' las brtsams te / / +sngon gyi gnas dang  'chi 'pho dang  skye ba mkhyen pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272436#272447#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7366;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7367# lus tha dad pa dag phan tshun  ltos na rgyu'i rkyen ma yin pa'i phyir dang  skal pa mtshungs pa rnams kyi sems la sogs pa dus mtshungs par skye ba'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.020#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1474437#1474437#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8701# 'chol ba yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni 'chol bar 'dug pa'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin par mi 'dod do // /

column3: dus thams cad las brtsams te spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'jug pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272377#272379#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7360# rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi de dag gi lhag par bya ba'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang  sprul pa'i sku de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin pa'i  phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column3: snod kyi 'jig rten ni shar phyogs la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'jig  pa dang 'chags pa mtha' dag mkhyen pa dang  'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi rang bzhin dang  gleng gzhi dang  sred pa dang  nyes dmigs dang  nges par 'byung ba dang  'gro ba'i lam yang mkhyen pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272456#272465#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7367;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7368# sprul pa'i sku de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sku la sems can gyi bsod  nams bskyed par bzlas te bshad pa ste / /

column3: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba ni 'di skyes bu yang yin la gdul bar bya ba'i skyes bu rnams kyang phal cher 'dul bar byed pa'o // /

column3: kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba ni mchog dang gtso bo'o // / +lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa zhes bya ba ni de dag don rtogs  pa dang sgrub par nus pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272493#272513#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7369;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7370;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7371;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7372;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7373# kha cig na re lan du gsungs pa 'di'i dgongs pa ni chos kyi sku dang  longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sprul pa'i sku de la ltos na chos kyi sku'i dbang dang  longs spyod  rdzogs pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis yin gyi / /

column3: sangs rgyas ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o // /
column4: 0.025#TD4019E.TXT.r#2418912#2418912#TD4019E.TXT.r_1497;TD4019E.TXT.r_1498# ngo bo'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste / / +de la chos kyi sku ye shes kyi bdag nyid du gyur pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i spyod yul te / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub kyi snying por sdig pa can gyi chos dang  bdud kyi  gyul gyi stobs thams cad bcom pa'o // /
de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o // / +'di ltar dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272527#272547#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7375# sku rnam pa gnyis po de dag gi dbang gis sprul pa'i sku 'byung ba'i phyir dang  gzhan yang sprul pa'i sku la don DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DE gnyis kyi byin gyi rlabs yin pa'i phyir sku rnam pa gnyis po de dag ni sprul pa'i sku de dag gis bskyed pa'i rgyu dang  yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu'o // /

column3: de yang thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa ste / / +re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'dis ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba thun mong ba bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272547#272563#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7375;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7376# sku rnam pa gnyis po de dag gi dbang gis sprul pa'i sku 'byung ba'i phyir dang  gzhan yang sprul pa'i sku la DON DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DE gnyis kyi byin gyi rlabs yin pa'i phyir sku rnam pa gnyis po de dag ni sprul pa'i sku de dag gis bskyed pa'i rgyu dang  yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu'o // / +de la rgyu dang rkyen zhes bya ba ni nye bar bskyed pa'i phyir don gyi rgyu dang rkyen zhes gsungs kyi yang dag pa'i rgyu rkyen ni ma yin no // /

column3: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni thun mong ma yin pa bstan to // / +mdo las mi  rtag pa'i 'du shes bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni kun tu bsten pa dang  goms par byas pas sangs rgyas par 'byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272563#272575#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7375;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7376;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7377# de la rgyu dang rkyen ZHES BYA BA NI NYE bar bskyed pa'i phyir don gyi rgyu dang rkyen zhes gsungs kyi yang dag pa'i rgyu rkyen ni ma yin no // / +kha cig na re chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ni gdul bar bya ba'i sems can de dag ni dbang  po dang ; /
column5: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272335#272338#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7357# kha cig na re 'di ni chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul bar bya ba'i sems can dag la rgyu dang rkyen gang zhig mdzad nas yon tan rnams skyed par bgyid ces zhu ba yin no zhes zer te / /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272317#272319#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7356# kha cig na re 'di ni chos kyi sku dang  longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku de dag gi rgyu dang rkyen gang  zhig mdzad ces zhu ba yin no zhe'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4050E.TXT.r#1120823#1120823#TD4050E.TXT.r_3425;TD4050E.TXT.r_3426;TD4050E.TXT.r_3427# de lta bu ni chos kyi sku ma yin pas / / +de'i phyir na chos kyi sku ma yin no // / +longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de ni sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dag na tha dad par snang la / /

column3: bsgom pa'i 'bras bu ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o // / +bsgom pa'i rnam pa ni dpe'i dbye ba dag gis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272574#272583#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7376;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7377;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7378# kha cig na re chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ni gdul bar bya ba'i sems can de dag ni dbang  po dang ; / +dmigs pa'i rkyen rnam pa gnyis yin pa'i phyir bsod nams bskyed de / /

column3: bsgom pa'i thabs ni dgon  par song ste zhes bya ba'am rgyas par 'byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272584#272591#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7379# ring ba'i rkyen 'di'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa gnyis sems can rnams kyi bsod nams bskyed pa zhes bstan to // /

column3: de la kun tu bsten pa ni mtshan nyid so so yang dag par rig pa yid la byed pas so // / +goms par byas pa ni mos pa yid la byas pas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272592#272602#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7379;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7380;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7381# ring ba'i rkyen 'di'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa gnyis sems can rnams kyi bsod nams bskyed pa zhes bstan to // / +gzhan yang sprul pa'i sku de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis po dag gi mthus byin     // /

column3: lan mang du byas pas ni ma lus pa dag gis so // / +yang kun du bsten pa ni shes bya'i dngos  po la kun tu gtod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272603#272610#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7380;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7381;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7382;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7383# gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te / / +de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad pa yod kyang gsum pa ni yang dag pa yin te / /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2394459#2394459#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9912;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9913# pa'i tshor ba gang yin pa'o zhes zer te / / +de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad pa yod kyang gsum pa ni yang dag pa yin te / /

column3: goms par byas pa ni rgyun mi 'chad pa dang gus par byas te sbyor ba'o // / +lan mang du byas pa ni yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246678#246683#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4170;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4171# don de la brten nas spyod pa skye ba dang  spyod pa'i rgyu 'bras thob pa ni don gyi go rims yin pa'i phyir ro // / +de  nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248404#248407#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4375# de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni bag chags gtan du spangs pas rab tu che ba yin pas des na mdo sde dang bstan bcos dag las so so nas don re re smos pas phan tshun 'gal  ba med do zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248677#248679#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4400# byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la  'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251743#251745#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4703# byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262761#262764#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6126;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6127# bam po bdun cu gnyis pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di  skad ces gsol to // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269379#269383#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6979# de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270065#270068#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7066# byang chub sems  dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271009#271012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7162;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7163# gand'i'i sgra med mod kyi 'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis gand'i brdungs pas ting nge 'dzin las ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das  la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272611#272619#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7382;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7383;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7384# mdo'i tshig dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273175#273178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7447# rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu 'byung ba ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das  la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273571#273572#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7483# byang chub sems dpal 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274461#274464#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7610# de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la  'di skad ces gsol to // /
column16: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122338#3122341#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4328;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4329# 'jam dpal rjes su mthun pa rnams kyi yon tan gang yin pa de ni phan yon gyi mtshan nyid  yin par rig par bya'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column17: 0.011#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3123150#3123151#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4429# de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang  chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column18: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271878#271883#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7294# bam po bdun cu lnga pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column19: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271422#271425#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7222;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7223# gzhan gyi stobs kyi phyir sems yod pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column20: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267922#267925#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6782;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6783# 'di ltar rjes su mthun pa'i chos la yon tan ji snyed yod  pa gang yin pa de ni bsngags pa brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: theg par byas pa ni rten gyi sgo nas so // / +dngos por byas pa ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272620#272630#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7383;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7384# byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // / +bcom ldan 'das mngon  par 'du bgyi bam mchis par 'dra lags na rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku kho na las ni sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'byung la / /

column3: nan tan du byas pa ni yid la byed  pa'i sgo nas so // / +yongs su 'dris pa ni ci 'dod pa dang tshegs med par 'thob pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272631#272648#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7384;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7385# bcom ldan 'das mngon  par 'du bgyi bam mchis par 'dra lags na rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku kho na las ni sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'byung la / /
column5: 0.018#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122848#3122854#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4396# ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku kho na las  sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'di 'byung zhing / /
column6: 0.021#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122938#3122939#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4404# de las sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang  sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan dpag tu med pa dag 'byung gi rnam par grol ba'i lus 'ba' zhig  dag las ni mi 'byung ngo // /

column3: legs par mthar phyin pa ni chos mnyan pa'o // / +legs par brtsams pa ni nang du tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272951#272952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7427# de bzhin du chos sku yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i  las thun mong las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung gi rin po che gzhan dag ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang las mngon par grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang brgya chen po gtong  bar mi nus so // /

column3: yang legs par mthar phyin pa ni gus par yid la byed pa'o // / +legs par  brtsams pa ni rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272649#272656#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7385# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus la ni dngos  po 'di dag mi 'byung lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku dang  theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyi bye brag bstan to // /

column3: yang legs par rdzogs pa ni mthar phyin par 'gro ba'o // / +legs par brtsams pa ni yang dag par sbyor ba'o // / +'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi rjes su mthun pa'i phyir rgod pa bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361674#2361676#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5942;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5943# de dag so so las yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa ma  'dres par rnam par bshad pa bston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361724#2361727#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5946;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5947;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5948# de dag bsdus pa las SO SO YANG DAG PAR rig pa gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lnga pa 'dris pa rnam par BSHAD PA BSTAN TO // / +'di yang zhu ba  gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380777#2380780#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8355;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8356;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8357# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis las gang dag bgyid lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi las ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba    gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388446#2388449#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9186# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220345#220346#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_793;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_794# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237281#237282#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239835#239837#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3317;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3318;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3319# 'di ni dang po'i bag la nyal gyi rnam pa'i grangs mang nyung rab tu dbye ba'o // / +'di yang zhu ba  gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264933#264937#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6443;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6444# de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid yongs su ma dag pa  bdun rnam par phye ste BSHAD PA BSTAN TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272657#272669#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7385;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7386# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus la ni dngos  po 'di dag mi 'byung lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku dang  theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyi bye brag bstan to // /
column13: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402927#2402927#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10945;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10946# ci'i slad du  sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar la sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sa'i ming gi don bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column14: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222898#222899#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column15: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226466#226466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column16: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237163#237163#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column17: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239247#239249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3246# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column18: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248700#248705#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4402;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4403# bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sprul pa'i sku bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column19: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253710#253712#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4968# dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste  bshad pa bstan te / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /

column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237329#237329#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2979# rigs kyi bu de ni sems can rnams kyi rang gi las kyi nyes pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239348#239348#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3256;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3257# mos pas spyod pa'i sa la mos pa chung ngu dang  'bring la zhugs pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246114#246114#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4101# sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs  su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256165#256165#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5232# rigs kyi bu rnam pa bdun du rig par bya ste zhes bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column16: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264977#264977#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6445# de las gzhan pa mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  thams cad mthun  par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpe nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grags pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang  shin tu rnam par dag pa ma yin pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pas  ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column17: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272740#272753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7394;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7395;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7396;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7397# de las gzhan pa'i chu shel dag las ni ma yin te zhes bya  ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column18: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338354#2338354#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3197# don dam pa nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa ston to // /
column19: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353612#2353612#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4973# rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngar yongs su bzung ba dang   bsams pa'i chos kyi mtshan ma'i don dag la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong thob pa gang yin pa de ni chos la gnas pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ston to // /
column20: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371536#2371536#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7222# 'on kyang 'dir khyod la mdor bsdus te de'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas  yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column21: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391916#2391916#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9601;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9602# byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang  yon tan yangs shing rgya che ba ji snyed yod pa dag rab tu 'dren par 'gyur te zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa     // / +ston to // /
column22: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392059#2392059#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9621# yang dag  pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi rnam pa bcu drug gi skye ba rab tu dbye ba shes pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi skye ba la mkhas pa zhes bya'o zhes pa la sogs pas ni gnyis pa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column23: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393919#2393919#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9847# rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na tshor ba rnam pa gnyis ma lus par 'gag par 'gyur te zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston  to // /
column24: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398546#2398546#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10386# byang chub sems dpa' rnams sngar mos pas spyod  pa'i sa la chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu la brten nas mos pa'i bzod pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column25: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230679#230679#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2143# rigs kyi bu de yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan gsungs pa ston to // /
column26: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236188#236188#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2851# rigs kyi bu chags pa med pa nyid dang  mi lta ba nyid dang  yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu    rgya che ba zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs bas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column27: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247070#247070#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4202# rigs kyi sa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i nges  par 'byung bas gnas su gyur pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column28: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274716#274717#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7641;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7642# khyod kyis yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs  pa ston to // /
column29: 0.013#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345640#2345641#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4036# rigs kyi bu tha dad pa    yang ma yin tha dad pa ma yin pa yang ma yin zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa bstan to // /
column30: 0.013#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358842#2358843#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5593# sa gsum pa 'od byed pa las ni thob pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column31: 0.013#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359247#2359247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5640# rigs kyi bu ji ltar bzung zhing rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i chos kyi mtshan ma dag la rags shing gsal bar myong ba dang  so sor rtog pa dang bcas pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gang yin pa de ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i  ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column32: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228609#228610#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1872# rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa lnga'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin    gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston te / /
column33: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214268#214268#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_29# rigs kyi bus de dag la kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni bcu gcig yod do zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column34: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224807#224807#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1416;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1417# rigs kyi bu snga ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi grogs su gyur pa'i phyir te  zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa ste / / +de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column35: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230000#230000#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2058# rigs kyi bu dngos po de ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug tu rig bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa sa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column36: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270170#270171#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7079# don nyid yang dag    par bstan pa dang  dpes nye bar mtshon pa dang  dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o // /
column37: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360624#2360624#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5800# rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas chos so so yang dag par rig par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis ba de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column38: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248472#248472#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4380# rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sprul pa'i sku'i phrin las mngon par 'du mdzad pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam pa thams cad 'byung ba lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis  pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column39: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273357#273357#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7461# gnyis po de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column3: khams kyi rgyal phran lta bu ni de las gzhan pa rnams so // / +dgon pa dang  shing drung dang  khang stong dag gi bla gab med pa dang  shing drung dang  sgrib gyogs smos pa ni gnas mal thams  cad bsdus te rab tu dbye ba ni de lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272747#272761#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7395;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7396;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7397;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7398# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +dpes nye bar mtshon pa dang  dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272762#272770#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7397;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7398;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7399;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7400# dpes nye bar mtshon pa yang dpe rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan pa nyid las rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +'di ni dpe dang po bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270169#270170#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7079# don nyid yang dag    par bstan pa dang  dpes nye bar mtshon pa dang  dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o // /

column3: gzugs mi rtag pa nyid dam zhes bya ba ni gzugs tsam yin gyi bdag ni med do zhes de ltar yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272769#272782#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7400;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7402;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7403;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7404# nyi ma dang zla ba las snang ba chen po 'byung bar bstan pa dang  de gnyis kyi rgyu bstan pa ste / /

column3: lam du 'gro ba la bar chad byed pa bzhi ni lam rnam pa gnyis la sogs pa ste / / +de la the tshom gyis ni 'gro bar mi rtsol ba  nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272783#272794#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7403;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7404;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7405;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7407# mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ji skad du / / +nyi ma zla ba ri rab phyed // /

column3: rnam par rtog pa dag dang log pa'i yan lag gis ni brtsal kyang rnam par rtog pa dang lta ba spyod pa dag gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272795#272805#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7405;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7407;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7408;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7409;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7410# dpag tshad lnga bcu lnga bcu gcig / / +'di nyid kyi 'grel pa las / / +nyi    ma dang zla ba la dpag tshad du yod ce na / /

column3: de dag med kyang gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa la mi bzod par 'gyur te / / +khro ba ni gzhan dag smra ba la 'khrug pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272804#272814#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7409;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7410;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7411;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7412# nyi ma ni lnga bcu gcig go // / +zla ba ni lnga bcu'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272822#272827#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7413;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7411;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7412# zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi ngos ni rin po che chu shel las mngon par grub pa ste bsil zhing gsal bar  byed pa'o // /
column6: 0.022#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1637826#1637827#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7048;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7049# zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni dpag tshad lnga bcu'o // / +nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor  gyi ni gcig dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu ste / /
column7: 0.022#TD4091E.TXT.r#714247#714248#TD4091E.TXT.r_3610;TD4091E.TXT.r_3611# zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni dpag tshad lnga bcu'o // / +nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni gcig dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu ste / /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#539133#539134#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11701# gzhan yang de nyid las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi ngos ni rin po che me shel las mngon par grub pa'o // /

column3: rab tu byung ba la yang rang dbang  med pa dang gzhan la rag lus pa dang  mi bzad pa dang ngan pa'i spyod pa dag gis dga' ba ma yin pa dag dang 'dris pa ste / /
column4: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#539133#539134#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11701# gzhan yang de nyid las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi ngos ni rin po che me shel las mngon par grub pa'o // /

column3: gnod pa'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro // / +de gnyis ni gyang sa yin te / / +de gnyis kyis kyang 'gro ba la bar chad byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272828#272836#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7413;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7414# zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi ngos ni rin po che chu shel las mngon par grub pa ste bsil zhing gsal bar  byed pa'o // /

column3: de dag med kyang rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i nags  khrod du zhugs pa'i phyir bar chad byed pa ni mi bzod pa'i thibs po'i nang du zhugs pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272837#272849#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7415;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7416;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7417# nyi ma la sogs pa'i gzhal med khang der sems can ji lta bu dag gnas she na / / +rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs su gtogs pa'i lha rnams so zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#549112#549112#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12878;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12879# 'di ltar 'gro ba  lnga po dag gi nang na yid rab tu dben zhing zhi bar nus pa ni mi lta bu med pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher bshad pa ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang  mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //// /

column3: 'di ltar yongs su bzung ba btang yang spang bar mi nus pa'o // / +'jigs pa dang bcas pa ni chom rkun dang gyo sgyu can gyi 'jigs pa yod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#255873#255873#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5199;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5200# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  gzhung rab tu bstan pa las kyang / / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bshad pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272850#272862#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7416;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7417;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7418# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du'o // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las kyang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las  bshad pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2330735#2330738#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2366;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2367# de bas na lan gsum bzlas pa dang  rnam pa bcu gnyis la yod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid la chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bshad pa ni yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang mthun pa yin no zhes bshad de zhib tu de nyid las  bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las ni thams cad yod par smra ba'i bye brag tu smra ba dag gi bsam pa ni mdor bsdu na 'phags pa'i lam thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o zhes zer te / /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351340#2351342#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4678;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4679# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las ni / /
column8: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347177#2347177#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4187# zhib tu bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa  dang rjes su mthun pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361581#2361581#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5931# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252650#252650#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4815# bstan bcos gzhung rab tu bstan pa dang yang dag pa'i  rigs pa las mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bshad pa dang mthun par ston to // /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536171#536171#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11290# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang mthun pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column12: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519011#519011#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8990;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8991# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa las kyang / /
column13: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2350637#2350637#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4603;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4604# de la spyi'i ming yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis ni bstan bcos     // / +yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las bstan pa bzhin du ngon rnam pa gsum yod de // /
column14: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352174#2352174#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4768;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4769# de la ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis ni / / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las bstan pa bzhin du gzugs med pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni mdor bsdu na dge ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis  bsdus shing sems rtse gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid do // /
column15: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352437#2352439#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4810;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4811# gzhan yang rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag ni sems can tshad med pa la dmigs pa yul du gyur pa'i phyir dang  bsod  nams tshad med pa skyed pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu tshad med pa rab tu 'dren pa'i phyir tshad med pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las ni / /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2350492#2350492#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4586# 'dir theg pa chen po'i bstan pa dang sbyar na yang grangs kyi dbang du mdzad nas ming bkod pa ni bstan  bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las bstan pa dag dang mthun pas / /
column17: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2333071#2333072#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2630# zhib tu ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang  sems sna tshogs bstan pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column18: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364464#2364464#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6292# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las kyang phal cher mdzod kyi bstan bcos las    'byung ba dang mthun par bshad do // /

column3: mi mngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ni nye    'khor thibs po yin pa dang gcan gzan dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272861#272871#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7417;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7418# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las kyang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las  bshad pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las nyi ma dang zla ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu lnga bcu zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267591#267591#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6752;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6753# gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las spyi dang bye brag gi sgo ni sngar tshig gcig mdor bstan nas tshig phyi ma gzhan gyis rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i  'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403942#2403942#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11056;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11057# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las kyang byang chub kyi phyogs  kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas pas nyon mongs pa'i shing bsregs nas shes rab kyi 'od 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'od 'phel bar byed pa'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: tsher ma dang bcas pa ni thams cad nas tsher mas gang ba'o // / +lam gol ba ni gzhan du 'gro ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272870#272881#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7418;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7419;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7420;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7421# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las nyi MA DANG ZLA BA NI dpag tshad lnga bcu lnga bcu zhes bshad do // /

column3: lam ngan pa ni mi mnyam pa ste / / +de ltar na lnga po de dag ni lam gyi skyon yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272880#272895#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7420;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7421;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7422;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7423# rin po che chu shel la sogs pa la rnam par rtog pa med kyang / / +nyi ma dang zla ba las snang ba chen po 'byung ste // /

column3: 'gro ba ngan pa sdang ba'i 'gro ba  ni 'gro ba'i skyon no // / +lam gol ba dang lam ngan par 'gro ba ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa kun tu bsten pa'i phyir 'gro ba po'i gang zag gi nyes pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272896#272909#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7423;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7424;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7425# 'di ltar sems can mthu chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyi phyir dang  sems can gyi las kyi dbang gi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122879#3122883#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4399;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4400# 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na mngon par 'du  byed pa med par 'dra ba yang 'di lta ste / / +sems can mthu chen po'i byin gyi rlabs nyid dang  sems can gyi las dbang nyid kyi phyir zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chu shel dang me shel kho na las sems can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byung la de las gzhan gyi chu shel dang me shel dag las  ni mi 'byung ba dang  nor bu rin po che rigs dang ldan pa las legs par byi dor byas pa las rgya'i gzugs brnyan 'byung la / /
column6: 0.022#TD4079E.TXT.r#759429#759430#TD4079E.TXT.r_471# bdag nyid chen po'i sems can de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang  sems can rnams kyi las bdag por gyur pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: chom rkun pa la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa dag kun tu bsten pa'i phyir ro // / +mi gyo ba ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272906#272917#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7424;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7425;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7426# gnyis pa rnam pa gnyis kyi rgyu bstan pa'o // / +'di ltar nyi ma dang zla ba'i rin po che las snang ba chen po 'byung ba ni rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis te / /

column3: mtha'  yas pa ni sred pa zad pa dang yul gyis yongs su 'gyur ro // / +mthong bar dka' ba ni zab pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272918#272927#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7426# mthu chen po dang  ldan pa lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla bas phyin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang  sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gis mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'chi ba med pa ni skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba yang dag par zad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272928#272935#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7426;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7427# mthu chen po dang  ldan pa lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla bas phyin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang  sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gis mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro // / +de bzhin du chos sku yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i  las thun mong las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung gi rin po che gzhan dag ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang las mngon par grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang brgya chen po gtong  bar mi nus so // /

column3: bde ba ni mi dang mi ma yin pas gtse ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'o // / +zhi ba ni sdug  bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang mchog tu bsil bar gyur pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272936#272943#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7427# de bzhin du chos sku yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i  las thun mong las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung gi rin po che gzhan dag ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang las mngon par grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang brgya chen po gtong  bar mi nus so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272943#272965#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7427# de bzhin du chos sku yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i  las thun mong las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung gi rin po che gzhan dag ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang las mngon par grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang brgya chen po gtong  bar mi nus so // /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#452408#452408#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_297# zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang de nyid las 'jig rten 'di'i sems can dag shin tu gdul bar dka' ba'i phyir / /
column7: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#804497#804497#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6304# mngal nas skye ba dang  sgo nga las skye ba'i sems can du gyur pa'i phyir ro //// /
column8: 0.025#TD4018E.TXT.r#3018206#3018206#TD4018E.TXT.r_1943;TD4018E.TXT.r_1944# yid gzhungs pa la sogs pa ni nad med pa las  skyes pa'o // / +sems can rnams kyi thun mong dang  thun mong ma yin pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul stug po dang  shing gi lcug ma la sogs pa'i dngos po skyes pa ste / /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#483071#483071#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4367# bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i smon lam chen pos byang chub  chen po yongs su tshol bas sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1130469#1130470#TD4047E.TXT.r_1340# sdar bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i las de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas / /
column11: 0.027#TD4072E.TXT.r#2099615#2099615#TD4072E.TXT.r_1049;TD4072E.TXT.r_1050# de yang 'dzin pa nyid du so sor snang ba'i phyir rnam PAR RTOG PA'O // / +de DAG LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DAS PA'I phyir rnam par rig pa med pa'o // /
column12: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#774625#774625#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1291;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1292# yang srid pa 'phen par byed pa'i las nye bar len pa'i phyir ro // / +de dag las byung ba'i phyir na nye bar len pa'i phung po dag go // /
column13: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#860371#860371#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15264# de la sems skyes pa'i mjug thogs su de dag skyes pa'i phyir dang  las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa la kun du rmongs pa'i phyir ro // /
column14: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224430#224431#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1373;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1374# ni rkyen gnyis pa'o // / +gzhan yang de nyid las sems can sdud cing phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dang  nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir / /

column3: dngos po bzang po ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir dmigs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272641#272641#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7384# bcom ldan 'das mngon  par 'du bgyi bam mchis par 'dra lags na rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku kho na las ni sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'byung la / /

column3: bde legs su 'gyur ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya ba'i dmigs pa'o // / +mya ngan med pa ni  dga' ba dang mi dga' ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang thob pa chud mi za ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272959#272970#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7427# de bzhin du chos sku yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i  las thun mong las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung gi rin po che gzhan dag ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang las mngon par grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang brgya chen po gtong  bar mi nus so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272988#272995#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7428# de bzhin du theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gis grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sku'i gzugs brnyan ston par mi nus so // /

column3: 'chi 'pho med pa ni rtag pa dang phyir mi ldog pa'o // / +rims nad med pa ni rnam par byang ba'o // / +yongs su gdung ba med pa ni 'dod pas phongs pa med pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272971#272981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7427;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7428# de bzhin du chos sku yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i  las thun mong las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung gi rin po che gzhan dag ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang las mngon par grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang brgya chen po gtong  bar mi nus so // /

column3: nad med pa ni nad dang 'bras thams cad rnam  par zhi ba'o // / +mi gyo ba ni gyo ba dang rlom pa thams cad zad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272960#272966#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7427# de bzhin du chos sku yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i  las thun mong las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung gi rin po che gzhan dag ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang las mngon par grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang brgya chen po gtong  bar mi nus so // /

column3: mya ngan las 'das pa ni phung po thams cad bzlog pa'o // / +bdag tu ma gyur cig / / +bdag gir ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus las brtsams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272992#273005#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7429# de bzhin du theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gis grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sku'i gzugs brnyan ston par mi nus so // /

column3: bdag dang bdag gi ngo bor nye bar song ba nang dang phyi'i skye mched  kyis bsdus pa bdag gi lus dang yongs su gzung ba'i dngos po mi skye ba don du gnyer ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273006#273020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7429;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7431# de bzhin du theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gis grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sku'i gzugs brnyan ston par mi nus so // / +gzhan yang     // / +nor bu rin po che las byi dor legs par byas pa de dag las ni rgyu'i gzugs brnyan 'byung la / /

column3: yang lus mi skye ba don du gnyer ba dang  de la brten pa'i tshor ba mi skye ba don du gnyer ba yang yongs su bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273021#273030#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7431;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7432# de las gzhan pa'i byi dor ma byas pa dag las ni ma yin zhes bya ba ni dpe gnyis pa bstan te / /

column3: bdag tu ma gyur cig bdag gir ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni da ltar byung ba'i dus     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273031#273040#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7432;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7433# 'di ltar bzo ba mkhas pas nor bu rin po che byi dor legs par byas pa las ni rgyan gyi gzugs brnyan 'byung gi / /

column3: las brtsams te / / +'di ni mi rtag pa'i 'gog pa la yongs su rtog pa sngon du 'gro ba so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa la yongs su rtog pa ste sngar legs su smon pa byas nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273039#273053#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7432;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7433;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7434# 'di ltar bzo ba mkhas pas nor bu rin po che byi dor legs par byas pa las ni rgyan gyi gzugs brnyan 'byung gi / / +de las gzhan pa'i byi dor ma byas pa dag ni ma yin pa bzhin no // /
column5: 0.024#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122930#3122931#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4403# pa'i thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pas shin tu sbyang ba byas pa las yang dag par grub pa yin pa'i phyir / /

column3: phyis da ltar byung ba'i rgyu la mi rtag par yongs su rtog go // / +nying mtshams mi sbyor ba ni shi  'phos pa'i rnam par shes pa mi skye ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273054#273066#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7434;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7435# de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings dpag tu med pa la dmigs pa'i thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pas shin tu sbyang ba byas pa las yang dag par grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku las ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan dpag tu med pa  dag 'byung gi / /
column5: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122938#3122942#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4404# de las sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang  sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan dpag tu med pa dag 'byung gi rnam par grol ba'i lus 'ba' zhig  dag las ni mi 'byung ngo // /

column3: len pa med pa ni mi gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa la ming dang gzugs mi 'jug pa'i phyir lus mi skye ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273067#273075#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7434;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7435# de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings dpag tu med pa la dmigs pa'i thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pas shin tu sbyang ba byas pa las yang dag par grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku las ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan dpag tu med pa  dag 'byung gi / / +rnam par grol ba'i lus 'ba' zhig las ni dngos po de dag yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o // /

column3: mi skye ba ni ming dang gzugs 'phel ba dang rgyas pa med pa'o // / +'dus byas thams cad zhi ba ni phung po lnga zhig pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273076#273087#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7435;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7436# rnam par grol ba'i lus 'ba' zhig las ni dngos po de dag yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o // / +chos kyi dbyings dpag tu med pa dag la dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi sku ni chos dpag tu med pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings zhes bya'o // /

column3: stong pa nyid ni nyon  mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba'o // / +mi dmigs pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273088#273095#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7437# chos kyi dbyings dpag tu med pa dag la dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi sku ni chos dpag tu med pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings zhes bya'o // /

column3: sred pa zad pa ni ma 'ongs pa la don du gnyer ba med pa'o // / +'dod chags dang bral ba ni da ltar byung ba'i longs spyod la dga' ba med pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273096#273103#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7438# thabs dang shes rab  ces bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa'i shes pas dge ba bsgoms te / / +nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal nas chos kyi sku gsal bar byed pa'i phyir thabs zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'gog pa ni de las gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'o / / +mya ngan las 'das pa ni phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'o // / +mi rtag pa ni zhig pa dang 'jig pa'i chos can no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273104#273113#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7438;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7439# nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal nas chos kyi sku gsal bar byed pa'i phyir thabs zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'dus byas ni sngon gyi mtha' las brtsams te rnam par brtags pa gang yin pa'o // / +bsam pa ni phyi ma'i mtha' las brtsams te don du gnyer ba gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273114#273126#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7439;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7440;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7441# de ni 'di skad du de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i thabs dang  shes rab kyis shin tu legs par nyon mongs pa sbyangs te / / +pha rol tu phyin pa drug brtsams pa las ni  chos kyi sku mngon par grub la / /

column3: rten cing  'brel bar 'byung ba ni da ltar gyi dus su rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis byung ba gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273127#273135#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7441;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7443# chos kyi sku las ni ye shes kyi snang ba 'byung zhing / /

column3: zad pa'i chos can ni phyogs gcig zad pa'o // / +'jig pa'i chos can ni thams cad 'gag pa'o // / +yang zad pa'i chos can ni thams cad 'gag pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273136#273144#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7443# sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan ston par 'gyur gyi / / +gang zag stong pa nyid du lta ba'i shes pa rnam par grol ba'i lus las ni snang ba chen po gtong ba dang  sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan ston par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'jig pa'i chos can ni rgyun rnam par 'gyur  ba'o // / +'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos can ni nyes dmigs dang ldan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273145#273156#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7443;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7444# gang zag stong pa nyid du lta ba'i shes pa rnam par grol ba'i lus las ni snang ba chen po gtong ba dang  sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan ston par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'gog pa'i chos can ni 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad las nges par 'byung ba'o // / +ma lus par spong ba zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273154#273173#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7445;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7447# mtshams  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334725#2334726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384462#2384464#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384831#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column8: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column9: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403468#2403471#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11009# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni snang ba'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column10: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405614#2405616#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11202;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11203# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nam mkha' lta bu'i nyes pa dag la ni sprin chen po lta bu'i chos kyi skus  kun du khyab pas zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems can nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa las byung ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs la / /
column11: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227468#227468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# ba'i thabs kyi brtson 'grus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column12: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228689#228689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1881# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par  rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column13: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228866#228866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column14: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228981#228981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column15: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1988# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column16: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230802#230802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155# drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// /
column17: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247471#247471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4260# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang  mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column18: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248951#248952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4431# bdud btul ba dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang / /
column19: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258660#258662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column20: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260979#260979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5879# yod par gyur pa'i grub pa dang  bya ba'i dngos po grub pa dang  grogs byas te grub pa dang  chos kyis grub pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column21: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256225#256228#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5242# yang dag par blang ba'i spyod lam bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag par blang ba'i chos bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column22: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271379#271379#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7213;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7214# sems med de sems rang dbang med pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column24: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385683#2385683#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8908# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul ba zhes 'byung ngo // /
column25: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233239#233239#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2453# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni 'jig rten med pa dang  tshol ba med pas bzod par byed pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column6: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393844#2393844#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9838;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9839# byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // / +bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su tshor ba thams cad ma lus par 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa la / /
column7: 0.023#TD4018E.TXT.r#3084253#3084253#TD4018E.TXT.r_10448# de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273190#273200#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7449# de bzhin gshegs pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i mthu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams 'dod pa'i khams kyi mi'i lus phun sum tshogs pa rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams dang  'dod pa'i    khams kyi lha dang  gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha'i lus phun sum tshogs pa thams cad snang ngo zhes gang gsungs pa de la / /
column5: 0.020#TD4043E.TXT.r#371188#371188#TD4043E.TXT.r_2048# 'di lta ste rgyal rigs shing s'a la lta bu la sogs pa dang  de  lta bu'i rigs rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1736530#1736530#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_4904# kha cig ni 'phrul dga' dang  kha cig ni 'thab bral dang  kha cig ni sum cu rtsa gsum dang  kha cig ni rgyal chen rigs bzhi dang  rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams dang  bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu  rnams dang  khyim bdag shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur to // /
column7: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#16062#16062#TD4036E.TXT.r_2398# rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams kyi khyim dag dang  bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams kyi khyim dag dang  khyim bdag gi rigs  shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams kyi khyim dag dang  grong mi rnams kyi khyim dag dang  ljongs kyi mi rnams kyi khyim dag dang  phyug po rnams kyi khyim dag dang  tshong dbon rnams kyi khyim dag dang  ded dpon rnams kyi khyim dag ste / /

column3: sdom ni / / +'dod pa gnyis dang bde bya dang / / +chos dang dge 'dun gzhi dang ni // /

column3: de la gsob kyis ni stong pa nyid bstan to // / +gsog gis ni mi sdug pa nyid bstan to // / +slu bas ni bden par na bde ba ma yin no zhes sdug bsngal nyid bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225872#225873#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231003#231004#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2176# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236135#236136#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236672#236675#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2908;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2909# ni bcu gsum pa pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi srid par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245241#245244#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4001# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246079#246080#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4097# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan  te ; /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248703#248705#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4402;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4403# bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sprul pa'i sku bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan NYID BSTAN TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253710#253712#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4968# dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste  bshad pa bstan te / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272277#272283#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7351;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7352;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7353;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7354# de bzhin gshegs pa dang de dag tu rgyu dang rkyen ci zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273223#273238#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7451# bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa lta bu zhig mchis dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems  can gyi lus yongs su 'dzin pa ston to // /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273602#273603#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7486# dngos po gang ni dka' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bdun pa zhing yongs su dag pa dang zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag na gang    dag rnyed par dka' ba dang  gang dag mod pa'i mtshan NYID STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column15: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221970#221972#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1018# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
column16: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242523#242525#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3639;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3640;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3641# bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa du dag gis gnas ngan len de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa gnas ngan len spong ba'i dus rab tu dbye ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs  pa bstan te ; /
column17: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360973#2360975#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5843;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5844;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5845# tshig gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa tshig rnam par bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column19: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235759#235759#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column20: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228565#228565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column21: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221161#221164#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_889;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_890;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_891;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_892# du ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab par bsdu  lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column22: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#240696#240696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3438# bcom ldan 'das bag la nyal de dag gnas ngan len de dag spangs pa rnam pa dus rab tu dbye ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa gnas ngan len spangs pas rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan  du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column23: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271454#271457#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7224;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7225;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7226# bcom ldan 'das de  bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gang lags pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gang lags pa de nyid la bye brag tu bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan NYID STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol pa dang   lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column24: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238744#238744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3180# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pa dang  gal du gsol ba dang  rung ba nyid du sgrub pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column25: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247723#247723#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4294# bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i gnas gyur pa gang yin pa de yang chos kyi sku legs par brjod par bgyi 'am zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par grol ba'i sku ston to // / +'di  yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtag pa dang  rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column14: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343469#2343469#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3791;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3792# zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'o // / +zhu ba gsol ba yang dgongs pa rnam pa gnyis te dang po ni ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi dmigs pa rnam  pa bzhi po dag la brten nas zhi gnas yongs su tshol ba zhus pa'o // /

column3: ji ltar na slu ba'i chos yin pa ni dpes bsgrub par bya ste sgyu ma lta bu ni rtag pa la sogs pa ma yin yang de bzhin du snang bas chos mthun pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273255#273269#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7453;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7454# zhu ba gsol ba'i dgongs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang  theg pa gsum gyi bsgrub pa la sogs pa gsungs pas gang gis bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa  dag ni lus dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs par 'gyur la / /

column3: byis pa 'drid pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba  de bzhin du mi shes pa'i phyir byis pa thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la yin te / /
de dag gi yun ring po nas slu ba la lhag par chags pa'i sgo nas rnam par 'gyur ba la skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gyis reg pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273269#273281#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7454# gang dag bstan pa dang 'gal bar byas pa dag ni lus yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar thob pa dang ldan yang nyams pa dang ldan no zhes bka' stsal ba'i rigs pa las lus phun sum tshogs pa thob pa dang ldan pa'i phyogs gcig kho na gsungs kyi / /

column3: mkhas pa rnams ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyir de lta ma yin no // / +rus pa'i keng rus lta bu ni ngoms mi shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273280#273289#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7454;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7455;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7456# gang dag bstan pa dang 'gal bar byas pa dag ni lus yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar thob pa dang ldan yang nyams pa dang ldan no zhes bka' stsal ba'i rigs pa las lus phun sum tshogs pa thob pa dang ldan pa'i phyogs gcig kho na gsungs kyi / /

column3: sha'i kham tshad lta bu ni mang po dang thun mong ba'o // / +rtsva'i sgron ma lta bu ni chos ma yin pa spyod pa dang mi mthun par spyod pa'i rgyu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273290#273301#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7455;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7456;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7457# nyams par 'gyur ba  ma gsungs pa la dgongs pa ci mchis zhes zhu ba yin no // / +bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan du na ci tsam du sems dang bcas pa dag ni rang gi las kyi dbang gis lus phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba yin na / /

column3: me'i dong lta bu ni 'dod pa'i sred pa'i yongs su gdung ba 'phel bar byed pa'o // / +sbrul gdug pa lta bu ni mkhas  pa rnams kyis spang bar bya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273300#273311#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7456;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7457# bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan du na ci tsam du sems dang bcas pa dag ni rang gi las kyi dbang gis lus phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba yin na / / +mdo dag las ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' mthu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can gyi lus phun sum  tshogs par byed do zhes gsungs pas / /

column3: rmi lam lta bu ni myur du 'jig par 'gyur ba'o // / +brnyan po'i rgyan lta bu ni rkyen la rag las pa'o // / +shing tog lta bu ni bag med pa'i sa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273312#273321#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7457;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7458# mdo dag las ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' mthu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can gyi lus phun sum  tshogs par byed do zhes gsungs pas / /

column3: mi gtsang ba rnams zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o // / +dri mi zhim pa ni zas dang skom dang longs spyod rnam par  'gyur ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248444#248446#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4379;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4380# 'di ni dang po sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269532#269534#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6990;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6991;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6992# de'i 'og tu sprul pa'i sems mnga' ba yang yin mi mnga' ba yang yin par ston pa'i phyir  'dir sems bstan pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /

column7: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273619#273620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7487;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7488# 'di ni dang po zhing yongs su dag pa dang ma dag pa dag na dngos po gang dkon pa dang mod pa cig car zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252138#252139#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4746;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4747# rnam pa  sna tshogs su bshad pa 'byung ba ni mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column9: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271465#271466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7226;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7228# 'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
