column3: rgyu'i dbang du byas nas de las rab tu skyes pa'o // / +rgyu las rab tu skye yang rkyen gyi  dbang gis ni skye'i gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274134#274150#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7565;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7566;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7567;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7568;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7569# ji ltar lha dang klu la sogs pa srid ce na / / +'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#472430#472430#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3007# sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel ba las zhing yongs su dag pa 'di khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul  yin na / /

column3: yang na tshig phyi ma phyi ma bshad pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +legs par mthong ba zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274148#274158#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7568;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7569;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7570;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7571# de'i phyir de nyid las khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul yin na ni / / +lha la sogs pa mi  srid de ; /

column3: legs par rig pa ni chos dang don so so yang dag par rig pa'o // / +legs par yid la byas pa ni yang dag par tshul  bzhin yid la byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274159#274169#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7570;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7571;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7572# de dag ni khams gsum pa na spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o // / +de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rig pa de lta bu'i rnam par snang ste / /

column3: legs par bstan pa ni kun nas so // / +legs par rtog pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgo nas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274170#274187#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7572;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7573# sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan pa'i phyir dang  sems can yongs su smin bar bya ba'i phyir dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams klu la sogs pa dag tu sprul nas mchod pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang  yang bdag nyid  de lta bur sprul nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: de gnyis ni legs par mthong ba yin no // / +snga ma gnyis ni de'i sbyor ba yin no // / +'phags pa ni zag pa med pa dang 'phags pa'i rgyu la yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2344364#2344367#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3894;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3895# sems shin tu sbyangs pa ni bcu gcig dge ba las shin tu sbyangs pa'i grangs su gtogs pa'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las lus yang zhing zo mdog bde ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu  sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bshad de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274188#274195#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7572;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7574# sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan pa'i phyir dang  sems can yongs su smin bar bya ba'i phyir dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams klu la sogs pa dag tu sprul nas mchod pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang  yang bdag nyid  de lta bur sprul nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring byed PA YIN PA'I PHYIR RO zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column6: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235593#235594#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2772;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2773;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2774# 'di la gnas par nus pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi  rjes su mthun pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan PA BZHIN NO // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa la chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes bya ba la thob par bya ba gang yin pa de ni chos zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2389914#2389915#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9372# de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366103#2366104#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6499;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6500# bstan pa'i sgo bstan pa dang  grangs bstan pa dang  ming bkod pa'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column9: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397964#2397965#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10317;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10318# bstan bcos rnal 'byor    spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column10: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263323#263324#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6217# yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column11: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#472528#472529#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3018# yang na bdag nyid kyi lus lha dang klu la sogs pa'i lus su sprul nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do zhes bshad do // /
column12: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263782#263782#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6293# dus thams cad du rtag par chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column13: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220572#220573#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_819;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_820;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_821# byang  chub sems dpa' ji tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bsgom pa dag ni don rnam pa 'di bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir spyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column14: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519009#519009#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8990;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8991# ji ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba lam yang yin la lam gyi yan lag kyang yin pa bzhin no zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan PA BZHIN NO // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa las kyang / /
column15: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351338#2351338#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4677;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4678;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4679# ji ltar bdag ma yin pa ni gnas dang dus gang du yang dngos po rjes su 'brel pa dang  gnas dang dus gang du yang bdag dang rjes su 'brel pa med pa lta bu yin  pa'i phyir 'di 'ba' zhig la ci yang med pa'i skye mched ces bya'o zhes zer te zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan PA BZHIN NO // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las ni / /

column3: nges par 'byung ba ni khams gsum pa'i sdug bsngal las nges par 'byung ba'o // / +nges par rtog pa can ni shin tu nges par 'byung ba dang phyir mi zlog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274194#274205#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7574;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7575# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang  lang gi che bsgyur ba las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316532#2316532#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_661# gong du bstan pa'i don rnam pa gnyis ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan las kyang 'di skad du ston to // /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2389914#2389915#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9372# de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397965#2397965#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10317;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10318# bstan bcos rnal 'byor    spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#514825#514825#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8491;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8492# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bshad pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po  bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227737#227738#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1766;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767# rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du bstan pa'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221408#221408#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_936# bslab pa gsum rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  bstan  bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  lung sna tshogs dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column11: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2340794#2340794#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3484# gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las zhi gnas ni 'di lta ste / /
column12: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222270#222270#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1062# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni bsags pa'i don gyi phyir tshogs zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column13: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222387#222387#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1082# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ji skad du / /
column14: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269928#269928#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7051# gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni dang por mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren    par byed pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas lha dang mi'i bar la yang dag par rab tu ston pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274206#274215#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7574;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7575;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7576;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7577# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang  lang gi che bsgyur ba las kyang de skad du ston to // / +gal te zhing yongs su dag pa dag na theg pa dman pa med na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274215#274226#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7576;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7577;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7578# 'phags pa shes     // / +rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa ji ltar go zhing rnam par bshad par bya ste / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das ni rten zhes bya ba ni chos bstan pa la the tshom skyes pa thams cad yang dang yang du sel ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274225#274234#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7578;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7579# de las ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa yod de dgra bcom pa la sogs pa yang der skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo zhe na / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das de mig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i shes  rab sgrub pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274235#274242#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7578;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7579;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7580# de las ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa yod de dgra bcom pa la sogs pa yang der skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo zhe na / / +smras pa / / +'di ni rigs ma nges pa'i nyan thos mi slob pa  theg pa chen por sems bsgyur ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i lus len pa dbang 'byor ba'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa yin te / /

column3: ye shes su gyur pa zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i shes rab sgrub pa'o // / +mngon du gyur pa ni bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab sgrub pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274243#274252#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7580;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7581# 'di ni rigs ma nges pa'i nyan thos mi slob pa  theg pa chen por sems bsgyur ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i lus len pa dbang 'byor ba'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa yin te / /

column3: chos su gyur pa ni thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab sgrub pa'o // / +don gsal bar gtan la 'bebs par byed pa ni the tshom thams cad  gcod par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274253#274263#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7580;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7581# 'di ni rigs ma nges pa'i nyan thos mi slob pa  theg pa chen por sems bsgyur ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i lus len pa dbang 'byor ba'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa yin te / / +dang po'i gzhi nyid las dgongs nas dgra bcom pa la sogs pa'i zhing yongs su dag par skye zhes bstan pa yin gyi / /

column3: don thams cad kyi rten ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sgrub pa'o // / +yid byung ba ni mthong ba'i lam la'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274264#274273#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7581;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7582;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7583# dang po'i gzhi nyid las dgongs nas dgra bcom pa la sogs pa'i zhing yongs su dag par skye zhes bstan pa yin gyi / / +yang dag par de na theg pa gnyis yod pa ni ma yin no // /

column3: 'dod chags dang bral ba ni bsgom pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa dag la'o // / +'gog pa ni phung po thams cad  'gog pa'o // / +yid byung ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba la zhugs pa ni de gnyis kyi sbyor ba la gnas pa rnams yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274274#274286#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7583;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7584;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7585;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7586# gal te  de ltar na ci'i phyir 'od dpag tu med pa'i mdo las / /

column3: 'gog pa la zhugs pa rnams ni mi slob pa yin no // / +yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni bden pa mthong bas 'dus byas thams cad las mi mthun par 'dzin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274287#274297#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7585;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7586;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7587# mtha' med pa thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa sha stag go zhes gsungs / / +gzhan yang bsgom pa bstan pa'i mdo las / /

column3: de  nas 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam la 'dod chags spong ba'o // / +rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni de nas 'dod chags dang de dang de grub pa dang bde ba gcig la de las gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274298#274308#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7587;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7588;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7589# gang zag 'bring rnam pa gsum ni zhing der gdod 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs she na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274308#274318#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7589;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7590;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7591# sangs rgyas 'od dpag  med kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / /

column3: yongs su  grol ba ni nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las grol ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274317#274327#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7590;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7591;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7592# gzhan longs spyod pa dang  sprul pa'i zhing ngo // / +de'i phyir 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274345#274351#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7594;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7595# sangs rgyas  'od dpag med kyi zhing khams na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa yongs su dag pa yod de / / +sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i zhing yongs su dag pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: de ni bram ze zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi mthar thug par 'gro ba dang sdig pa bsal ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274328#274343#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7592;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7593;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7594# sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i zhing khams na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa yod de / / +sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag pa lta bu'o // /

column3: de'i mtshan nyid la the tshom med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rang gi rtogs pa la the tshom med pa'o // /
'gyod pa  bcad pa ni bya ba mi byed pa med pa dang bya ba ma yin pa byed pa med pa'o // /
column4: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274325#274326#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7592# sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i zhing khams na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa yod de / /

column3: sred pa dang bral ba ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sred pa med pa'o // / +'byung ba dang zhig pa la chags pa rgyas par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bag la nyal spangs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274352#274363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7595;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7596;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7597# sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i zhing yongs su dag pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +mdo 'di las ni gzhan longs spyod pa'i zhing gi dbang du mdzad nas theg pa dman pa med ces gsungs pa yin no // /

column3: de la da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni 'byung ba'o // / +'das pa     // / +ni zhig pa ste de dag gis ni bram ze de yongs su brtag par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274364#274374#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7596;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7597;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7598;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7599# mdo 'di las ni gzhan longs spyod pa'i zhing gi dbang du mdzad nas theg pa dman pa med ces gsungs pa yin no // / +gzhan yang mdo 'di las brtsams nas / /

column3: de la thos pa mang po dang shes bzhin dang dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa la yang gong ma gsum srid pas de'i phyir lung ston pas na bzhi pas kyang yongs su brtag par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274375#274388#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7598;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7599;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7600# bstan bcos sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba bstan pa las / / +theg pa gnyis kyi rigs can dag mi skye zhes bstan la / /

column3: de la chags pa zhes bya ba ni chags  pa brgyad de / / +zhig pa las mya ngan du gyur pa dang  da ltar gyis yang dag par bsdus pa 'byung ba la lnga ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274389#274403#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7600;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7601;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7602# 'od dpag med kyi mdo la sogs pa las ni sprul pa'i zhing la dgongs nas nyan thos yod par gsungs te / /

column3: byi dor byas pa dang  sbas pa dang  bdag gir byas pa dang  gyen du bsgreng ba dang  chung ngu bsgreng ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274402#274412#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7601;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7602;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7603# 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gi phyir ro // / +gzhan yang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270689#270690#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7128;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7129# gnod pa med kyang langs pa gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen des na gdon mi za bar ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: ma 'ongs pa la gnyis te / / +rnam par spyad pa dang  rnam par bskyod pa'o // / +gsum ka la ni stug por byas pa dang  ro bro bar byas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274411#274422#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7603;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7604# gal te de lta na sangs rgyas 'od dpag med dang  sangs rgyas mi gyo ba la sogs pa snyigs ma lnga'i dus su 'byung ba ma yin na / /

column3: de la mya ngan du gyur pa ni sdug pa yongs su gyur pa'o // / +byi dor byas pa ni gsos pa dang yongs su bskyangs pa'o // /

column3: sbas pa ni 'tshe ba'i gnas las bskyabs pa'o // / +bdag gir byas pa ni bdag gir bya bas rang gir byas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274432#274442#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7606;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7609# sangs rgyas dang po thugs bskyed pa'i tshe / / +sangs rgyas rnams theg pa gsum gyis / /

column3: gyen du bsgreng ba ni bdag mchog go snyam pa'i nga rgyal te / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu ni nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan can no zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274443#274455#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7609# bdag kyang theg pa gsum gyis sems can sgrol bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'i lung dang  rigs pa des na sprul pa'i zhing yongs su dag pa dag na yang theg pa gsum yod par gyur pa yin no // /

column3: chung ngu bsgreng ba ni bdag chung ngo snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo // / +rnam par spyad pa ni ma 'ongs pa don du gnyer ba'i sred pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246678#246683#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4170;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4171# don de la brten nas spyod pa skye ba dang  spyod pa'i rgyu 'bras thob pa ni don gyi go rims yin pa'i phyir ro // / +de  nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248404#248407#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4375# de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni bag chags gtan du spangs pas rab tu che ba yin pas des na mdo sde dang bstan bcos dag las so so nas don re re smos pas phan tshun 'gal  ba med do zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273569#273572#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7483# byang chub sems dpal 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column15: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122337#3122341#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4328;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4329# 'jam dpal rjes su mthun pa rnams kyi yon tan gang yin pa de ni phan yon gyi mtshan nyid  yin par rig par bya'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column16: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246052#246055#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4094;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4095# de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // / +bcom ldan 'das  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bstan pa 'di'i ming ci lags / /

column21: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267922#267925#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6782;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6783# 'di ltar rjes su mthun pa'i chos la yon tan ji snyed yod  pa gang yin pa de ni bsngags pa brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column23: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113715#3113715#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3149;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3150# de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang  bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang  dag 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bstan pa 'di'i ming ci lags // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +gser ram zong gzhan dag go // / +ro bro bar byas pa ni nye bar longs spyad par bya ba gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396240#2396247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10115;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10116# bcom  ldan 'das dgongs pa zab mo rnam par nges pa'i 'grel pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bstan pa 'di'i ming ci lags / / +bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa bka' bzhin du sgrub pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246066#246073#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4095;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4096# bcom ldan 'das  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bstan pa 'di'i ming ci lags / / +bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274479#274490#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7611;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7612;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7613# bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa 'di'i ming ci lags / / +bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du spyod pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274541#274543#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7619;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7620;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7618# de yan chad du zhu ba dang  lan dag gis yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs bshad zin nas / / +'di man chad gnyis pa bka' bzhin du bsgrub pa'i phyogs ston to // /
column8: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544196#544196#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12304# de nas bcom ldan 'das  kyis byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // /

column3: rnam grangs gzhan yang mdor bsdu na tshig lngas lam rtogs pa dang  lam  rtogs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba yongs su bstan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274491#274508#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7612;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7613;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7614;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7615;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7616# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du spyod pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to / / +mdo'i tshig 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / /

column3: de la de ni bram ze zhes bya bas ni lam rtogs pa yongs su bstan to // / +the tshom med pa dang  'gyod pa chad pa dang  sred pa dang bral ba dang  'byung ba dang zhig pa la chags pa rgyas par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di dag gis  ni lam rtogs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba yongs su bstan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274509#274522#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7615;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7616;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7617;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7618# gleng gzhi'i phyogs dang  'phags pa'i gsung rab yang dag par bstan pa'i phyogs te / / +gsum pa bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs ni med do zhes zer te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274523#274531#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7617;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7618;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7619# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na le'u brgyad pa 'di la phyogs rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +zhu ba dang lan dag  gis yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs dang  bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs so // /

column3: kun shes pa thob pa dang  lung ston pa'i the tshom spong ba dang  rgyu ba na spyod pa brjed pa'i chos nyid spong ba dang  ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu spong ba dang  da ltar gyi sdug bsngal rgyu gnas ngan len spong ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274544#274551#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7620;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7621;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7622# 'di man chad gnyis pa bka' bzhin du bsgrub pa'i phyogs ston to // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246071#246073#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4096# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274484#274486#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7612# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du spyod pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to / /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396245#2396247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10116# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa bka' bzhin du sgrub pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // /

column3: de la    don gyi skabs 'dir ni 'byung ba ni khams gsum par gtogs pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pa yin par blta bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274552#274561#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7621;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7622;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7623# kha cig na re mdo 'di las phyogs rnam pa gsum  yod de ; / +le'u dang po gcig ni bstan pa 'byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi phyogs zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.014#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#462923#462926#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1777;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1778# kha cig ni mdo sde 'di gcig la phyogs rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +dang po ni le'u gcig gis bstan pa 'byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen bstan pa'i phyogs so // /

column3: zhig par ni mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pa'o // / +chags pa yang don gyi skabs 'dir ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274560#274570#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7622;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7623;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7624# le'u dang po gcig ni bstan pa 'byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi phyogs zhes bya'o // / +le'u gzhan bdun po dag ni 'phags pa'i bstan pa yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs zhes bya'o // /

column3: de dag kyang ji ltar  mtshan ma med pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i slob pa la rgyas par 'gyur ba ltar dgra bcom pa ni de lta ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274568#274580#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7623;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7624;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7625;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7626# le'u gzhan bdun po dag ni 'phags pa'i bstan pa yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs zhes bya'o // / +gsum pa bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs ni le'u bzhi po dag gi mjug tu bstan pa dag yin te / /

column3: rnam par rtog pa dang  spros pa dang  chags pa dang / / +'du shes zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa rnam pa bzhi ste / / +snga ma gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i phyogs kyi yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274578#274590#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7624;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7625;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7626# gsum pa bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs ni le'u bzhi po dag gi mjug tu bstan pa dag yin te / / +'di lta ste / / +rang gi ngo bo nyid  kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u dang  rnal 'byor rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u dang  sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba bsgrub pa'i le'u te / /

column3: gnyis  ni khyim pa phyi ma'i phyogs kyi yin te / / +chags pa rgyas na de skye bar 'gyur ro // / +rab tu byung ba rnams ni yul nyams su myong ba rjes su dran pa las ni rjes su rtog pa tsam yin la gyo ba kun tu spyod pa las ni spros pa yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274586#274598#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7626;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7627# rang gi ngo bo nyid  kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u dang  rnal 'byor rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u dang  sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba bsgrub pa'i le'u te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274599#274608#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7627;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7628# de yan chad du le'u snga ma gsum po dag las 'byung ba'i bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs ni bstan nas / /

column3: khyim pa rnams ni yul nye bar gnas pa las chags pa yin no // / +chags pa dang de'i mtshan ma la 'dzin pa las de'i 'du shes pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274607#274618#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7627;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7628;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7629# de yan chad du le'u snga ma gsum po dag las 'byung ba'i bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs ni bstan nas / / +'dir ni bzhi po de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya  bsgrub pa'i bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs bstan pa yin no zhe'o // /

column3: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ni gnyis te / / +tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang  de'i gnas kyi chos rnams te / / +rgyu gang las skye ba de ni de'i rgyu yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274619#274631#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7629;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7630;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7631# kha cig na re phyogs dang po gnyis ni bshad pa snga ma gnyis dang mthun no // /

column3: mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba'i  don ci zhe na / / +gang gis na mi rtag pa dang ris mthun pa des na skye ba dang rga ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal skye ba dang  gang gis na reg pa la rag lus te tshor ba des na rnam par 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274630#274640#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7630;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7631;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7632# gsum pa bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs ni logs na yod de / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ji skad du byang chub sems dpa'     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274640#274653#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7631;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7632;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7633# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ji skad du byang chub sems dpa'     // / +sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal chos kyi rgyal po dang  lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'khor thams cad rab tu dga'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2377879#2377879#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8023# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: skye zhing 'jig ste / / +de'i phyir tshor ba gsum po thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274654#274662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7633;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7634# mdo gzhan dag las tshig mi 'byung ba ni rgya gar gyi dpe nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#496658#496659#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6262# dpe  rnams de ltar tha dad par gyur pa yang lo ts'a ba rnams kyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir dang  yang na rgya gar gyi dpe nyid las bye brag 'di lta bu yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#503731#503731#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7143;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7144# dpe gzhan gnyis las tshangs pa smos pa ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na rgya gar gyi dpe nyid las mi mthun pa yod pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: gang yang skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi chos can dang  gang yang rnam par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi chos can de dag ni bdag nyid kyis bdag med pas bdag med pa'am // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345472#2345474#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4018;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4019;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4020# gnyis pa lhag mthong dang rjes su mthun pa'i yid la byed pa bstan to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360582#2360583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5793;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5794# dang po chos dang don yang dag par rig pa bstan pa de yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba  dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274663#274679#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7633;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7634;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7635;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7636;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7637# mdo gzhan dag las tshig mi 'byung ba ni rgya gar gyi dpe nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes  zer te / /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2394261#2394262#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9884;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9885# nyid kyi myong ba dang yul gyi myong ba yin no zhes zer te // / +de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad ba yod kyang 'dir ni re zhig gsum pa dang sbyar ro // /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2363906#2363906#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6215# de ltar rnam pa gsum  du bshad pa yod kyang 'dir ni re zhig gsum dang sbyar nas bshad par bya ste / /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393886#2393887#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9842;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9843# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /

column3: de la bdag mi gnas pas na bdag med pa ste / / +des na stong pa nyid dang bdag med pa'i rnam  pa smos pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355413#2355415#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5196;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5197;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5198# 'dres pa chung du'i chos la dmigs pa la sogs pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i sgo dang 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa rkyen dang ldan par rab tu bstan pa'i sgo dang rtogs pa dang thob pa'i gnas skabs rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo ste 'di ni dang po'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis su  dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274678#274688#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7636;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7637;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7638# phyogs 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393885#2393887#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9841;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9842;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9843# ni bco brgyad pa lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su tshor ba 'gag par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269489#269489#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6984;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6985;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6986# longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i sems 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang  sprul pa'i sku la sems mnga' ba'am mi mnga' ba bstan pa'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang   bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa ste / /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380482#2380484#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8317;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8318;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8319# 'di ni dang po rgyu bstan pa'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column9: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544224#544225#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12306;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12307;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12308# zhu ba gsol ba la bsngags  shing bshad par gnang ba bstan pa dang  don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar shes par bya ste zhes bya ba man chad kyis zhu ba bzhin du lan yang dag par bstan pa'o // / +dang po la yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /
column10: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345592#2345592#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4030;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4031;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4032# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas kyi lam dang lhag mthong gi lam tha dad ces bgyi'am tha dad pa ma lags zhes bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong  gi lam gnyis gcig pa dang tha dad pa rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2348248#2348248#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4286;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4287;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4288# bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i sems dang spyod yul gzugs brnyan gang lags pa de yang sems 'di dang tha dad pa lags zhes bgyi'am zhes bya ba  la sogs pas ni gnyis pa zhus pa dang lan dag gis rnam par gyeng ba'i sems kyi dmigs pa rnam par 'byed pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column12: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354545#2354545#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5083;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5085;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5086# gzhan yang 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas ngang lhags thong zhes kyang gsungs na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa 'dres pa dang ma 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston     // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column13: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349118#2349118#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4388;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4389# lhag mthong bstan  pa yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column14: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343463#2343463#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3790;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3791# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'o // /

column3: kun shes par byed pa ni thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis te / / +shes pa gsungs pa 'di skad du gsung ngo zhes bya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271939#271942#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7297;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7298# 'di ni dang po rnam pa gsum po de dag so so nas mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhig dang ldan zhes zhu ba'o // / +bcom ldan  'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274687#274696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7638;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7639# 'di ni dang po 'phags pa'i gsung rab kyi mtshan dang bka' bzhin bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column6: 0.020#TD4018E.TXT.r#3090297#3090297#TD4018E.TXT.r_11172;TD4018E.TXT.r_11173# 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i bshad pa ye shes dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'i le'u drug pa las sa dang pha rol du phyin pa dpyad pa lnga pa'o //// / +de nas yang bcom ldan    'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272239#272239#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7348;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7349# rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni mtshan nyid rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan  'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: yang dag par shes par byed pa ni bsams pa las byung ba'o // / +nges par rtog pa ni bsgoms pa las byung ba'i ste / / +shes rab rnam pa     // / +gsum rgyu ba de nyid la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni mgu ba dang  yang dag par mgu ba dang  yangs su mgu ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345637#2345641#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4036# rigs kyi bu tha dad pa    yang ma yin tha dad pa ma yin pa yang ma yin zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs PAS LAN YANG DAG PAR gsungs pa bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396296#2396298#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10124# rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di la khyod kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zhus pa'i lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402963#2402966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10950;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10951# rigs kyi bu don chen po yongs su grub cing sngon ma 'dris pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems thob nas dga' ba chen po skye bas de'i phyir dang po ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa zhes  bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246109#246114#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4101# sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs  su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274697#274714#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7639;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7640;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7641;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7642# bcom ldan  'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column9: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355498#2355502#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5208# 'dres pa chung du'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column10: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220026#220029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_767# rigs kyi bu rkyen rnam pa bzhi'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston te // /
column11: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231024#231027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2178# rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na rnam pa bzhir rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column12: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236753#236756#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2919# rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa lnga'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column13: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271486#271489#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7231# sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column14: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345521#2345522#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4024# lhag mthong gi rjes su mthun pa'i  mos pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid la byed pa yin par brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ste / /
column15: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378999#2379001#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8145# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams  pa la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyis deng 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di ltar don zab mo 'dri ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i ched du'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de  bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column16: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338350#2338354#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3197# don dam pa nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs PAS LAN YANG DAG PAR gsungs pa ston to // /
column17: 0.022#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3123171#3123172#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4432;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4433# bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa / / +'jam dpal 'di  ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba bsgrub pa nges pa'i don bstan pa yin te / /
column18: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238793#238793#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3184# rigs kyi bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi  ngo bo nyid med pa 'dzin par byed do zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column19: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247757#247757#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4297# rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku zhes brjod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column20: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236532#236532#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2889# rigs kyi  bu gcig la gcig brten nas bsgom pa bskyed pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column21: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273620#273620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7487;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7488# 'di ni dang po zhing yongs su dag pa dang ma dag pa dag na dngos po gang dkon pa dang mod pa cig car zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column22: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397671#2397672#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10281# sangs rgyas kyi  sa'i bar du bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column23: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381382#2381383#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8431# 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems ni gnyi ga'i sgrib pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column24: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2372588#2372588#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7363# rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid yid la byed pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column25: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269557#269557#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6994# dngos po 'di ni sprul pa lta bur rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column26: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248445#248445#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4379# 'di ni dang po sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column27: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269533#269533#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6990;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6991# de'i 'og tu sprul pa'i sems mnga' ba yang yin mi mnga' ba yang yin par ston pa'i phyir  'dir sems bstan pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column28: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273327#273327#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7459;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7460# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / / +rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i mthus byin gyis brlabs nas lam gang dang bsgrub pa gang gis thams cad du  sems can rnams lus phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dag ci rigs par de dag la lam de dang bsgrub PA DE YANG DAG PAR bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / /
column29: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221204#221204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_897# ngas brtson 'grus thams    cad du 'gro ba yin par bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column30: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252138#252138#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4746# rnam pa  sna tshogs su bshad pa 'byung ba ni mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column31: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381876#2381876#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8489# rigs kyi bu ji tsam du rmugs pa dang gnyid yod PA DAG YANG DAG BAR LEGS PAR rab tu bsal bar gyur ba de tsam gyis na zhi gnas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag ba thob pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de    bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column32: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263912#263912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6309;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6310# phug ron shin tu yun ring po'i dus su sangs rgyas su 'grub par  'gyur ro zhes bstan pa la sogs pa'i bstan pa dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub pa yin pas khungs su brjod par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column33: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271466#271466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7228# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / / +rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: mi rtag par rjes su blta / / +'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su blta / / +'gog par rjes su blta zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste / /

column8: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388512#2388514#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9190# ci ltar thos pa dang bsams pa'i chos dag la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems khyad par can gyis  legs par gtan la 'bebs pa dang  legs par bsams pa dang  legs par gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid de nyid nang du yang dag par yid la byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to / /

column3: sems can gcig tu mos pa'i phyir gong bu ma yin yang gong bur snang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274843#274854#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7653# dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong 'gos chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //// /

column3: tshor ba chu'i chu bur lta bu ni gsum 'dus pa las skyes pa dang mi gnas par chos mthun pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274863#274871#TD4026E.TXT.r_1;TD4026E.TXT.r_2;TD4026E.TXT.r_3;TD4026E.TXT.r_4# rgya gar skad du // / +s'u tra aa lam k'a ra bya khyam / /

column3: de las lta bu ni  dbang po ste / / +de skye ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro // / +yul lta bu ni sprin no // /
chu lta bu ni rnam par shes pa'o // / +char pas btab pa lta bu ni reg pa'o // / +chu'i chu bur lta bu ni tshor ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2519833#2519838#TD4020E.TXT.r_4;TD4020E.TXT.r_5;TD4020E.TXT.r_6# theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i tshig le 'ur byas pa / / +sangs rgyas dang dd  byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274870#274882#TD4026E.TXT.r_2;TD4026E.TXT.r_3;TD4026E.TXT.r_4;TD4026E.TXT.r_5;TD4026E.TXT.r_6# s'u tra aa lam k'a ra bya khyam / / +bod skad du // / +mdo sde'i rgyan gyi bshad pa / /

column3: myur du 'gag pa dang mi gnas pa'o // / +'du shes smig rgyu lta bu ni gyo ba'i bdag nyid dang  rnam pa    du ma 'byung ba dang  dmigs pa la phyin ci log tu byed pa dang  skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa yongs su gcod pa'i tshul gyis yul gsal bar byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2519856#2519862#TD4020E.TXT.r_7;TD4020E.TXT.r_8;TD4020E.TXT.r_9# sdug bsngal bsgral phyir de yi bdag nyid sdug bsngal  'gro la snying rje las // / +theg mchog bstan pa'i rnam pa chos kyi de yis 'gro ba'i sems can la // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274883#274892#TD4026E.TXT.r_6;TD4026E.TXT.r_7# don shes don ston RAB TU BYED PA DAG dang tshig rnams dri med pas // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274893#274905#TD4026E.TXT.r_7;TD4026E.TXT.r_8;TD4026E.TXT.r_9# sdug bsngal bsgral  phyir sdug bsngal 'gro la snying rje'i phyir te de'i bdag nyid // /
column7: 0.022#TD4020E.TXT.r#2519840#2519847#TD4020E.TXT.r_6;TD4020E.TXT.r_7# don shes don ston rab tu byed pa ngag dang tshig rnams dri med pas // /

column3: ji ltar na 'du byed rnams chu shing lta bu yin zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +skyes bu mig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa nyan thos  so ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274904#274916#TD4026E.TXT.r_8;TD4026E.TXT.r_9;TD4026E.TXT.r_10# theg mchog bstan pa'i rnam pa chos kyi de yis 'gro ba'i sems can la // / +'byor ba'i don tshul bla med gyur ba lang yi bdag nyid ston par byad // /
column5: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#275034#275035#TD4026E.TXT.r_38# 'byor ba'i don tshul bla med gyur ba rnam pa lnga'i  bdag nyid ston par byed do // /

column3: sta re rnon po zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi mtshon cha'o // / +tshal du 'jug ces bya ba ni 'gro ba lngar gtogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274915#274925#TD4026E.TXT.r_9;TD4026E.TXT.r_10;TD4026E.TXT.r_11# 'byor ba'i don tshul bla med gyur ba lang yi bdag nyid ston par byad // / +don shes don ston rab tu byed PA ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS pa ni ci zhes bstan pa  las brtsams pa yin no // /
column5: 0.024#TD4029E.TXT.r#2120811#2120811#TD4029E.TXT.r_65# rnam par dbye ba bdun po 'di dag dang  don shes don ston rab tu byed PA ZHES BYA BA NAS bzung ste / /

column3: chu shing gi sdong po zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi lus shing dang chos mthun pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274926#274934#TD4026E.TXT.r_10;TD4026E.TXT.r_11;TD4026E.TXT.r_12;TD4026E.TXT.r_13;TD4026E.TXT.r_14# don shes don ston rab tu byed PA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pa ni ci zhes bstan pa  las brtsams pa yin no // / +su zhig brgyan par byed ce na / / +don shes pa'o / /

column3: sar pa drang po zhes bya ba ni bdag byed pa po dang za ba por lta ba'o // / +des de drung nas  bcad nas zhes bya ba ni bdag tu lta ba spong ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274935#274953#TD4026E.TXT.r_13;TD4026E.TXT.r_14;TD4026E.TXT.r_15;TD4026E.TXT.r_16;TD4026E.TXT.r_17;TD4026E.TXT.r_18;TD4026E.TXT.r_19;TD4026E.TXT.r_20# rgyan ci zhig brgyan par byed ce na / / +don ston rab tu byed pa'o // /

column3: lo ma'i glegs bu rnam par bshig ste zhes bya ba ni sems pa du ma'i 'du byed rnam par smin pa tsam du rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274953#274961#TD4026E.TXT.r_19;TD4026E.TXT.r_20;TD4026E.TXT.r_21# tshig dri ma med PAS ZHES BYA BA NI / / +tshig dang  yi ge rigs pa dang 'brel ba zhes bya brgyas par 'byung ba ste / /

column3: des de'i snying po ma yin pa yang mi rnyed na zhes bya ba ni de dag dus gzhan du mi gnas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274960#274970#TD4026E.TXT.r_20;TD4026E.TXT.r_21;TD4026E.TXT.r_22;TD4026E.TXT.r_23;TD4026E.TXT.r_25;TD4026E.TXT.r_26# tshig dang  yi ge rigs pa dang 'brel ba zhes bya brgyas par 'byung ba ste / / +ngag dang tshig dang yi ge dag pa med par ni don bstan par mi nus so // /

column3: snying po lta  zhig smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ni shin tu rtag pa dang brtan pa'i bdag dang byed pa po dang za ba po ga la snang zhes bya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274971#274984#TD4026E.TXT.r_23;TD4026E.TXT.r_25;TD4026E.TXT.r_26;TD4026E.TXT.r_27;TD4026E.TXT.r_28# sdug bsngal bsgral ba'i phyir / / +gang las she na // / +sdug bsngal 'gro la snying rje'i phyir te // /

column3: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu yin zhe na / / +sgyu ma byed pa zhes bya ba ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang mi gyo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa'i  tshig bla dags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#274985#275003#TD4026E.TXT.r_27;TD4026E.TXT.r_28;TD4026E.TXT.r_29;TD4026E.TXT.r_30;TD4026E.TXT.r_31# de'i bdag gnyid sdug bsngal ba'i  'gro ba la snying rje ba gang yin ba'i snying rje de'i phyir ro // / +de'i bdag ces bya ba ni snying rje'i bdag nyid do // /

column3: lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi la brten pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275002#275011#TD4026E.TXT.r_31;TD4026E.TXT.r_32;TD4026E.TXT.r_33# chos kyi rnam grangs gang la theg pa mchog bstan pa'i rnam pa yod pa'i chos de'i'o // /

column3: sgyu ma rnam pa bzhi byed ces bya ba ni ji ltar de dag tu glang po che'i tshogs la sogs pa snang pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275010#275027#TD4026E.TXT.r_32;TD4026E.TXT.r_33;TD4026E.TXT.r_34;TD4026E.TXT.r_35;TD4026E.TXT.r_36# gang gi ched du  brgyan par byad ce na / / +des 'gro ba'i sems can la'o // /

column3: glang po che la sogs pa'i tshogs de dag yongs su grub pa ma yin pa de bzhin  du ; / +bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang mi gyo ba nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi la brten cing dmyal ba la sogs pa'i lus ston pa de yang mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de nyid kyis de'i lus yongs su grub pa med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275027#275035#TD4026E.TXT.r_35;TD4026E.TXT.r_36;TD4026E.TXT.r_37;TD4026E.TXT.r_38# theg pa chen pos 'gro ba'i sems can gyi ched du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +rgyan rnam pa du zhig gis brgyan par byed ce na / /

column3: sgyu ma'i gzugs bzhin no // / +dkar po'i  phyogs kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275050#275065#TD4026E.TXT.r_40;TD4026E.TXT.r_41;TD4026E.TXT.r_42# bla med gyur ba zhes bya ba ni theg pa bla na med par gtogs pa'o // / +da ni don gyi tshul lnga'i bdag nyid de tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pas ston par byed de // /
column5: 0.0#TD4030E.TXT.r#2867929#2867934#TD4030E.TXT.r_449# de'i tshe 'dis da ni don gyi tshul lnga'i bdag nyid de tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pas ston par byed de zhes bya ba tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i 'jug par byed pa dang  ngag tha dad par bshad par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#891754#891754#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_380# da ni don gyi tshul lnga'i rang bzhin de dag tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan to zhes bya ba la / /

column3: sdom ni / / +skye dang rga dang 'chi ba dang / / +chags dang 'dod dang nyon mongs dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2519872#2519877#TD4020E.TXT.r_9;TD4020E.TXT.r_10# 'byor pa'i don tshul bla med gyur pa rnam lnga'i bdag nyid ston par byed // / +gser las brdungs byas 'dra zhing padma rgyas pa bzhin // /
column5: 0.025#TD4030E.TXT.r#2865421#2865422#TD4030E.TXT.r_61# don 'di nyid bstan bcos mdzad pas gser  las brdungs byas 'dra zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpe nye bar bkod pa sngon du 'gro bas / /

column3: 'dod chags rab rgyas zhe sdang dang / / +gci mug chung dang khyad par nyid // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275066#275073#TD4026E.TXT.r_42;TD4026E.TXT.r_43;TD4026E.TXT.r_44# gser las brdungs byas 'dra zhing padma rgyas pa bzhin // /

column3: skye ba ni dang po nyid du nying mtshams sbyor ba'i 'brel pa ste / / +ming dang gzugs     // / +kyi gnas skabs so // / +kun tu skye ba ni lus yongs su rdzogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2519890#2519898#TD4020E.TXT.r_11;TD4020E.TXT.r_12;TD4020E.TXT.r_13# bkres pas nyen pa gyos legs kha zas za ba 'dra // / +'phrin yig legs pa thos 'dra rin chen sgrom phye lta'i // /

column3: byung ba ni rum nas byung ba'o // / +mngon par grub pa ni lang tsho'i gnas skabs nas bzung ste / /

column3: dar la bab pa dang dar yol ba'i gnas skabs kyi bar gang yin pa'o // / +ches 'gras ni rgas  pa'i gnas skabs kyi bar gang yin pa'o // /

column3: phung po rnyed pa ni ming dang gzugs kyi gnas skabs so // / +khams rnyed pa ni de nyid du de'i sa bon rnyed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275103#275113#TD4026E.TXT.r_47;TD4026E.TXT.r_48# tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni dpe ldas chos de'i don rnam par lnga'i dbang du byas nas ston te / / +bsgrub par  bya ba dang  bye brag tu shes par bya ba dang  bsam par bya ba dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  yongs su grub pa rtogs pa'i don so so rang gis rig par bya ba byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4031E.TXT.r#2959346#2959351#TD4031E.TXT.r_120# bsgrub par bya ba dang  bye brag tu shes par bya ba dang  bsam par bya ba dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  yongs su grub pa rtogs pa'i don so so rang rig par bya ba byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa nyid // /

column7: 0.027#TD4029E.TXT.r#2122283#2122286#TD4029E.TXT.r_278;TD4029E.TXT.r_279# sangs rgyas kyi bya ba bsgrub pa dang  phyi rol gyi dngos bo sna tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas su gyur ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bshad do // / +yongs su grub pa rtogs pa'i don so so rang gis  rig par bya ba byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams yin te / /

column3: skye mched rnyed pa ni ming dang gzungs 'phal bas skye mched drug yongs su rdzogs pa'o // /

column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2121060#2121063#TD4029E.TXT.r_106# bsgrub par bya ba dang  bye brag tu shes par bya ba dang  bsam par bya ba dang  bsam gyis mi  khyab pa dang  yongs su grub pa rtogs pa'i don so so rang gis rig par bya ba dang  byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid do // /

column3: phung po mngon par 'grub pa ni 'byung ba nas  bzung ste rgas pa'i bar ro // / +srog gi dbang po byung ba ni ris mthun pa snga ma yongs su btang ste ris mthun pa gsar gyi tshe yongs su 'dzin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275122#275139#TD4026E.TXT.r_48;TD4026E.TXT.r_49;TD4026E.TXT.r_50;TD4026E.TXT.r_51;TD4026E.TXT.r_52# bsgrub par  bya ba dang  bye brag tu shes par bya ba dang  bsam par bya ba dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  yongs su grub pa rtogs pa'i don so so rang gis rig par bya ba byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid do // / +de mdo sde'i rgyan 'dis rnam par 'grol na go rims bzhin du // /

column3: rga ba ni na tshod yongs su gyur pas 'gro ba na rdeg 'cha' zhing 'gyel ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275140#275148#TD4026E.TXT.r_51;TD4026E.TXT.r_52;TD4026E.TXT.r_53# mdo sde'i rgyan 'dis rnam par phye na dga' ba'i mchog bskyed do // / +gang gi tshe chos de rang bzhin gyis yon tan dang ldan pa yin na // /
column5: 0.014#TD4029E.TXT.r#2123531#2123535#TD4029E.TXT.r_447# don shes pa don ston pas chos brgyan par byed do zhes bshad pa dang  gang gi tshe chos de rang bzhin gyis yon tan dang ldan pa  yin na ji ltar brgyan par byed ces bya ba'i klan ka 'di yongs su spang ba'i phyir / /

column3: mgo skya ni skra dang ba sbu ma tshang zhing mdog dkar ba dang ser ba'o // /

column3: gnyer mas gang ba ni pags pa 'khums pa'o // / +rnying pa ni na tshod yongs su gyur pa nyid mdangs med cing skya bor gyur pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: khar  bal brten pa gang yin pa'o // / +lus sme ba nag pos gang ba ni sme ba nag po dag gis lus bkra bar byas pa'o // /

column3: theg che ba ni 'phral gyi bya ba 'greng ba dang 'chags pa dag mi mang ba'o // / +nyam dma' ba ni yul dag la dbang po rnams rgyu ba mi mang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275198#275210#TD4026E.TXT.r_60;TD4026E.TXT.r_61;TD4026E.TXT.r_62# dper na gzugs brgyan dang rang bzhin nyid kyis yon tan dang ldan pa me long gi nang du song na mthong ba'i dbang gis rab tu dga' ba'i mchog bskyed pa de bzhin du // /

column3: nyams pa ni dran pa dang blo mi mang  ba'o ; / / +yongs su nyams pa ni dbang po la sogs pa de dag nyid skad cig dang thang cig de dang de dag nyid 'das shing 'bri ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275209#275224#TD4026E.TXT.r_61;TD4026E.TXT.r_62;TD4026E.TXT.r_63# legs par gsungs pa dag gis rtag tu yon tan dang ldan pa'i chos de yang don rnam par phye ba blo dang ldan pa rnams  la dga' ba khyad par can bskyed de / /

column3: dbang po rnams yongs su smin pa ni de dag nyid kyi bye brag go // / +'dus byas rnams rnyings par gyur pa ni dbang po'i gnas rnams dus gzhan du gnas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2519935#2519941#TD4020E.TXT.r_19;TD4020E.TXT.r_20;TD4020E.TXT.r_21# ji ltar mnams na rab dku  la ; / / +myangs na zhim pa'i sman bzhin du // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275225#275236#TD4026E.TXT.r_63;TD4026E.TXT.r_64;TD4026E.TXT.r_65# de'i 'og tu tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis chos de la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir phan yon rnam pa gsum ston te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#894018#894024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_667;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_668;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_669# ji ltar bsnams na rab dku la // / +myangs na zhim pa'i sman bzhin du // /

column3: rnyings  pa ni de dag nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba'o // / +shi 'phos pa ni lus yongs su por ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275235#275244#TD4026E.TXT.r_64;TD4026E.TXT.r_65;TD4026E.TXT.r_66;TD4026E.TXT.r_67# ji ltar bsnams na rab dku la // / +myangs na zhim pa'i  sman bzhin du // /

column3: 'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi ka nyid do // / +zhig pa ni gang zhig na lus ror 'dug pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2519948#2519950#TD4020E.TXT.r_22;TD4020E.TXT.r_23# don dang yi ger shes par bya // / +chos dka' rgya chen zab mo 'di // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275245#275253#TD4026E.TXT.r_66;TD4026E.TXT.r_67;TD4026E.TXT.r_68;TD4026E.TXT.r_69# chos kyang de bzhin gnyis su gnas // / +don dang yi ge shes par bya // /

column3: nub pa ni gang na mi gnas pa'o // / +yang zhig pa ni gzugs kyi lus so // / +nub pa ni ming gi lus so // / +tshe nyams shing drod nyams    zhes bya ba ni 'chi kar de'i dus su snying gar gnas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2519955#2519970#TD4020E.TXT.r_23;TD4020E.TXT.r_24;TD4020E.TXT.r_25;TD4020E.TXT.r_26;TD4020E.TXT.r_27# chos dka' rgya chen zab mo 'di // / +rgyal po bzhin du mnyes par dka' // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275251#275261#TD4026E.TXT.r_68;TD4026E.TXT.r_69;TD4026E.TXT.r_70;TD4026E.TXT.r_71# chos dka' rgya chen zab mo 'di // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275262#275272#TD4026E.TXT.r_70;TD4026E.TXT.r_71;TD4026E.TXT.r_72;TD4026E.TXT.r_73# mnyes par byas na de bzhin du // / +yon tan mchog gis nor sbyin byed / /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#894258#894258#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_700;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_701# mnyes par byas na de bzhin du // / +yon tan mchog gi nor sbyin byed // /
column8: 0.021#TD4031E.TXT.r#2959235#2959235#TD4031E.TXT.r_106# rin chen rigs ldan rin thang med la sogs pa'o // /

column3: srog gi dbang po 'gag pa ni tshe thams cad yongs su gtugs pa'o // / +'chi ba ni rnam par shes pa snying gar yongs su 'dor ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275271#275281#TD4026E.TXT.r_72;TD4026E.TXT.r_73;TD4026E.TXT.r_74;TD4026E.TXT.r_75# rin chen rigs ldan rin thang med // / +lta mi    shes pa'i mi mi mgu // /
column5: 0.018#TD4020E.TXT.r#2519973#2519980#TD4020E.TXT.r_27;TD4020E.TXT.r_28;TD4020E.TXT.r_29;TD4020E.TXT.r_30# rin chen rigs ldan rin thang med // / +lta mi shes pa'i mig mi mgu // /

column3: dus byas pa ni de phyin chad de / / +shi nas zhag gcig gam gnyis sam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275282#275289#TD4026E.TXT.r_74;TD4026E.TXT.r_75;TD4026E.TXT.r_76;TD4026E.TXT.r_77# de bzhin mi mkhas chos 'di la // / +zlog na de bzhin mgu bar 'gyur // / +phan yon rnam par gsum la / /

column3: zhag gsum mam / / +zhag bdun lon pa'o // / +skye mched drug la byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad bdag tu 'dzin pas ni chags par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275290#275310#TD4026E.TXT.r_76;TD4026E.TXT.r_77;TD4026E.TXT.r_78;TD4026E.TXT.r_79;TD4026E.TXT.r_80;TD4026E.TXT.r_81;TD4026E.TXT.r_82# phan yon rnam par gsum la / / +snam gyi dpes ni sgrib pa spong ba'i rgyu nyid de // /

column3: bdag gir 'dzin pas ni nye bar chags par 'gyur ro // / +'jig tshogs la lta ba ni rtsa ba can 'jig rten so so'i lta bar gyur pa rnams dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi dbang can sred pa  rnam par spyod pa rnams kyis ni lhag par chags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275311#275322#TD4026E.TXT.r_81;TD4026E.TXT.r_82;TD4026E.TXT.r_83;TD4026E.TXT.r_84# mngon par shes pa la sogs pa yon tan khyad par can rnams kyis dbang phyug sbyin par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +rin po che rigs dang ldan pa'i ring thang med pa'i dpes ni / /

column3: bde ba'i tshor ba'i gnas lta bu'i skye mched drug la ni 'dod chags dang bcas pas ro myong bar byed pa'o // / +sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i gnas lta bu la ni zhe sdang dang bcas pas spong bar byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275323#275334#TD4026E.TXT.r_84;TD4026E.TXT.r_85;TD4026E.TXT.r_86;TD4026E.TXT.r_87# de ltar shes pa'i mi ni 'phags pa'i skye bo yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma  yin pa'i tshor ba'i gnas lta bu la ni gti mug dang bcas pas khas len par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275335#275342#TD4026E.TXT.r_86;TD4026E.TXT.r_87# kha cig theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang ma yin na / / +de la phan yon 'di lta ga la yod ces log par zhugs pa de dag la 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka' nyid du sgrub pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2123570#2123570#TD4029E.TXT.r_452;TD4029E.TXT.r_453# de'i 'og tu kha cig theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang ma yin na / / +de la yon tan 'di lta ga la yod ces log par zhugs pa la chos la dbang ba bsngags par yon tan brjod pa bsgrub pa'i skabs su ji ltar theg pa chen po 'di kho na  yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar theg pa chen po bsgrub par bya'o // /

column3: 'das pa'i skye mched drug la ni bltas pa dang bcas pas rgyas par byed do // / +ma 'ongs pa la ni mngon par dga' ba dang bcas pas gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275343#275353#TD4026E.TXT.r_87;TD4026E.TXT.r_88;TD4026E.TXT.r_89# de la phan yon 'di lta ga la yod ces log par zhugs pa de dag la 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka' nyid du sgrub pa'i phyir / /

column3: da ltar byung ba la ni lhag par zhen pa dang bcas pas  mngon par zhen to // / +rang gi yongs su gzung bar gyur pa gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i skye mched drug la ni bdag gir byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275352#275365#TD4026E.TXT.r_88;TD4026E.TXT.r_89;TD4026E.TXT.r_90;TD4026E.TXT.r_91;TD4026E.TXT.r_92# gtan tshigs rnam par dbye ba las brtsams te tshigs su bcang pa // / +sngar lung ma bstan lhan cig byung // /
column5: 0.028#TD4020E.TXT.r#2520005#2520005#TD4020E.TXT.r_34;TD4020E.TXT.r_35# yod dang med na yod med dang / / +gnyen po dang ni sgra gzhan phyir // /

column3: rang gi yongs su gzung bar ma gyur pa gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa tha ma dang 'bring dang khyad par can la ni nga rgyal gyi rnam pa la brten pas rlom sems su byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275366#275380#TD4026E.TXT.r_91;TD4026E.TXT.r_92;TD4026E.TXT.r_93;TD4026E.TXT.r_94;TD4026E.TXT.r_95# yod dang med na yod med dang / / +gnyen po dang ni sgra gzhan phyir // /

column3: mnyam par  gzhag pa yin pa'i sa pa 'dod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa la ni gong nas gong du don du gnyer bar byed do // / +mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni ji ltar srid pa rgya che ba dang gya nom pa yin pa'i phyir brten par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275381#275391#TD4026E.TXT.r_94;TD4026E.TXT.r_95;TD4026E.TXT.r_96# gal te 'di dam pa'i chos kyi bar chad byed par phyis 'ga' zhig gis phyung ba yin na // / +ci'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i  'jigs pa bzhin du snga nas lung ma bstan / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275391#275399#TD4026E.TXT.r_96;TD4026E.TXT.r_97# lhan cig byung zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang dus mnyam du byang bar dmigs kyi / /

column3: khyim pa'i phyogs la brten  pa gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya ni ro'i sgo nas 'khor gyi rjes su song ba yin pa'i phyir ro myong bar byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275398#275414#TD4026E.TXT.r_96;TD4026E.TXT.r_97;TD4026E.TXT.r_98;TD4026E.TXT.r_99;TD4026E.TXT.r_100# lhan cig byung zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang dus mnyam du byang bar dmigs kyi / / +phyis ni ma yin na ji ltar 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pa nyid du shes / /

column3: rab tu byung ba'i phyogs la brten pa'i skye mched drug la ni le lo dang bag med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'dor ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275412#275423#TD4026E.TXT.r_99;TD4026E.TXT.r_100;TD4026E.TXT.r_101# de ltar zab cing rgya che ba'i chos  'di ni rtog ge pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin te / /

column3: 'dod pa dang sdug pa dang dga' ba     // / +dang yid du 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bzhi po 'di dag ni mdor bsdu na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275424#275433#TD4026E.TXT.r_101;TD4026E.TXT.r_102# brjod du zin kyang de la ma mos pa'i phyir 'di gzhan dag gis bshad do zhes bya bar yang mi rung ngo // /

column3: 'dod pa'i dngos po yongs su ston par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +'dod pa'i dngos po de yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275434#275444#TD4026E.TXT.r_102# grub pa zhes bya ba ni 'on te gzhan zhig gis mngon par rdzogs  par sangs rgyas nas bshad do zhe na ni 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin pa nyid du grub ste / /

column3: btsal bar bya ba dang  brtag par bya ba dang  lhag par zhen bar  bya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275445#275452#TD4026E.TXT.r_102;TD4026E.TXT.r_103;TD4026E.TXT.r_104# grub pa zhes bya ba ni 'on te gzhan zhig gis mngon par rdzogs  par sangs rgyas nas bshad do zhe na ni 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin pa nyid du grub ste / / +gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas / /

column3: de la 'dod pa ma 'ongs pa ni btsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275453#275460#TD4026E.TXT.r_103;TD4026E.TXT.r_104;TD4026E.TXT.r_105;TD4026E.TXT.r_106;TD4026E.TXT.r_107# gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas / / +de skad du 'chad pa de nyid sangs rgyas yin no // /

column3: 'dod pa 'das pa ni 'dod pa byas pa dang dga' bar byas pa 'ba' zhig yin pa'i phyir sdug pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275461#275469#TD4026E.TXT.r_105;TD4026E.TXT.r_106;TD4026E.TXT.r_107;TD4026E.TXT.r_108;TD4026E.TXT.r_109# yod dang med na yod med dang / / +zhes bya ba ni / / +gal te theg pa chen po cung zad cig yod na ni /// /

column3: 'dod pa'i dngos po da ltar byung ba ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +yul gyi dngos po dang myong ba'i dngos  po'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275470#275478#TD4026E.TXT.r_108;TD4026E.TXT.r_109;TD4026E.TXT.r_110# de yod dang 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin par grub ste / / +'di las gzhan pa'i theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.028#TD4029E.TXT.r#2122816#2122816#TD4029E.TXT.r_338;TD4029E.TXT.r_339# de yod dang 'di sangs rgyas  kyi bka' yin par grub ste / / +'di las gzhan pa'i theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ni yod na yod pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin no // /

column3: de la ji snyed du yul gyi dngos po la 'dod pa de ni dga' ba yin no // / +myong zin pa'i dngos po la 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yid du 'thad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275477#275490#TD4026E.TXT.r_109;TD4026E.TXT.r_110;TD4026E.TXT.r_111# 'di las gzhan pa'i theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir ro // / +'on te med na ni de med dang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang med pas nyan thos kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin gyi theg pa chen po ni ma yin no zhes  bya ba de yang mi rung ste / /

column3: 'dod pa'i dngos po 'das pa'am / / +ma 'ongs pa'am / / +da ltar byung ba'am / / +yul lam myong ba ni 'di dag tsam du zad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275489#275500#TD4026E.TXT.r_110;TD4026E.TXT.r_111;TD4026E.TXT.r_112# 'on te med na ni de med dang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang med pas nyan thos kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin gyi theg pa chen po ni ma yin no zhes  bya ba de yang mi rung ste / / +sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par sangs rgyas rnams mi 'byung pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'di'i btsal bar  bya ba'am / / +brtag par bya ba'am / / +lhag par chags par bya ba de dag thams cad ni tshig 'di dag gis bstan pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275501#275512#TD4026E.TXT.r_112;TD4026E.TXT.r_113;TD4026E.TXT.r_114# gnyen po zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po bsgoms na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen por 'gyur te / /

column3: 'dod pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus la brten nas btsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // / +sdug pa ni da lta'i dus la brten nas ngoms mi myong bas 'dod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir  ro ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275513#275527#TD4026E.TXT.r_114;TD4026E.TXT.r_115# sgra gzhan phyir zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin gyi don ma yin no // /

column3: yid du 'thad pa ni 'das pa'i dus la brten nas rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas yid du'ang bas mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275528#275539#TD4026E.TXT.r_115;TD4026E.TXT.r_116# de lta bas na sgra ji bzhin gyi don gyi rjes su 'brangs nas 'da  sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin par rig par ni mi bya'o // /

column3: dga' ba'i ngo bo ni sdug pa gang la brten nas dus gsum la 'dod par 'gyur ba dang  'dod pa dang yid du 'ong bas mngon par brjod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275540#275549#TD4026E.TXT.r_116# la la sngar lung ma bstan zhes bshad pa gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du ma  dgongs nas ma 'ongs pa 'di lung ma bstan par zad do snyam du sems pa la btang snyoms su gzhag tu mi rung bar tshigs su bcad pa / /

column3: 'dod pa dang  ldan pa ni 'dod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ram zer ba'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2520012#2520013#TD4020E.TXT.r_36;TD4020E.TXT.r_37;TD4020E.TXT.r_38# sangs rgyas  rnams ni mngon sum spyan // / +bstan pa dag kyang srung bar mdzad // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275550#275557#TD4026E.TXT.r_116;TD4026E.TXT.r_117;TD4026E.TXT.r_118;TD4026E.TXT.r_119# la la sngar lung ma bstan zhes bshad pa gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du ma  dgongs nas ma 'ongs pa 'di lung ma bstan par zad do snyam du sems pa la btang snyoms su gzhag tu mi rung bar tshigs su bcad pa / /

column3: longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gnas lta bur gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +chags par bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275558#275568#TD4026E.TXT.r_117;TD4026E.TXT.r_118;TD4026E.TXT.r_119;TD4026E.TXT.r_120;TD4026E.TXT.r_121# sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon sum spyan // / +bstan pa dag kyang bsrung bar mdzad // / +dus la'ang ye shes ma bsgribs pa // /

column3: dngos po lnga la kun tu sbyor bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir kun tu sbyor ba rnams  so ; / / +dngos po rnam pa lnga ni kun du sbyar bar bya ba dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275569#275579#TD4026E.TXT.r_120;TD4026E.TXT.r_121;TD4026E.TXT.r_122# de phyir btang snyoms mi rung ngo // / +tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ci zhig ston zhe na / /

column3: kun tu sbyor ba dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa'i dngos po dang  rgyu mthun pa'i dngos po dang  'gro ba'i dngos po'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275580#275592#TD4026E.TXT.r_122;TD4026E.TXT.r_123# rgyu gsum gyis ma 'ongs pa na bstan pa la gnod pa chen po la btang snyoms su gzhag tu mi rung bar ston te / / +sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon sum pa'i spyan nyid kyis 'bad pa mi mnga' bar ye shes 'jug pa'i phyir dang  bstan pa bsrung bar bya ba la 'bad  pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang  dus thams cad la ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pa'i mthus so // /

column3: de la kun tu sbyar bar bya ba ni kun du sbyor ba rnams kyi dmigs pa yin te / / +'di ltar rjes su chags pa    la sogs pas so so'i mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang bas de la kun tu sbyor bar byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275593#275603#TD4026E.TXT.r_123;TD4026E.TXT.r_124# sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon sum pa'i spyan nyid kyis 'bad pa mi mnga' bar ye shes 'jug pa'i phyir dang  bstan pa bsrung bar bya ba la 'bad  pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang  dus thams cad la ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pa'i mthus so // /

column3: kun tu sbyor ba rnams nang yang phan tshun 'dren par byed pa yin pa'i phyir kun tu sbyor bar byed pa'o // / +kun tu sbyor ba'i gzhi mthong ba'i chos kyi kha na ma tho bskyed par 'gyur zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275604#275611#TD4026E.TXT.r_123;TD4026E.TXT.r_124;TD4026E.TXT.r_125# sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon sum pa'i spyan nyid kyis 'bad pa mi mnga' bar ye shes 'jug pa'i phyir dang  bstan pa bsrung bar bya ba la 'bad  pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang  dus thams cad la ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pa'i mthus so // / +la la yod dang med na yod med phyir // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275611#275619#TD4026E.TXT.r_124;TD4026E.TXT.r_125# la la yod dang med na yod med phyir // / +zhes bshad pa gang yin pa nyan thos kyi theg pa 'di nyid theg pa chen po yin pas 'di kho nas byang chub chen po 'thob bo snyam  du sems pas de'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa / /

column3: de las skyes pa sems  las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba'i bar du yang so sor myong bar byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275618#275629#TD4026E.TXT.r_125;TD4026E.TXT.r_126;TD4026E.TXT.r_127;TD4026E.TXT.r_128# zhes bshad pa gang yin pa nyan thos kyi theg pa 'di nyid theg pa chen po yin pas 'di kho nas byang chub chen po 'thob bo snyam  du sems pas de'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa / /

column3: de'i phyir kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir dngos po la yang kun tu sbyor bar byed do // / +ma 'ongs pa na 'dod chags drag po la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa la yang kun tu sbyor bar byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#275628#275637#TD4026E.TXT.r_126;TD4026E.TXT.r_127;TD4026E.TXT.r_128;TD4026E.TXT.r_129;TD4026E.TXT.r_130# theg pa chen po nyid du mi rung bar tshigs su bcad pa / / +ma tshang ba dang 'gal ba dang / / +thabs min de ltar ma bstan phyir // /
